Consuelo es una señora con 47 años de edad, dedicada a la preparación y posteriormente venta de comida, un negocio el cual inicio hace poco y del cual ha logrado salir adelante con su familia conformada por cuatro hijos mayores y su esposo.
Trabaja todos los días entre 8 y 10 horas diarias.

Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de un enfriador e insumos como arroz, sal, azúcar, salsas entre otros.
Su deseo es seguir trabajando para pagarle la educación a sus hijos, ya que estos son el motor que impulsan a esta mujer para seguir luchando.

Se siente segura porque sabe que de la mano de Interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva  lo lograra
texts.en:
Consuelo is a 47-year-old woman whose work is preparing and then selling meals.  She started this business a short while ago, and it has enabled her and her family to get by. Her family consists of four grown children and her husband. She works between 8 and 10 hours every day.

Consuelo is asking for a loan which she will use to invest in buying a refrigerator and supplies such as rice, salt, sugar, salsas, etc.  Her wish is to continue working so she can pay for her children's education - they are what motivates this woman to carry on with her struggle. She feels confident because she knows that with the help of Interactuar and Kiva  she will achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and supplies such as rice, salt, sugar, salsas, etc.

loans.name: Olya

texts.en:
This young lady’s name is Olya and she is 24 years old. She has vocational medical education and for 5 years she has worked at Ijevan city’s hospital as a midwife. At the same time in the frontier village Achajur of Tavush region, where she lives with her parents and small brother, she is engaged in farming and agricultural works. 

On the farm with the help of her father she takes care of their farm cattle such as pigs, piglets and chickens. From her farm with her mother Olya sells their land’s goods; persimmon, cherry, apple, fig and also beans, cucumber.  Olya is very strong willed young lady who just does her best to help her parents to overcome their family’s financial hardships that they have now. 

This loan Olya asks for the purchase of more piglets for her farm and also some fodder for the farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy more piglets for her farm and also some fodder for the farm cattle

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru:
Мунира   трудолюбивая женщина.  Ей 42  года. Она замужем и имеет четырех детей. Она занимается дехканством. Она выращивает овощи и зерно. Также она занимается животноводством. Её семья помогает ей в работе. Её муж работает сварщиком.  
Мунира обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет приобрести минеральные удобрения. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Munira is a hardworking 42 year old woman who is married and has four children. She works in agriculture, growing vegetables and grains, and also raises livestock. Her family helps with the work. Her husband is a welder. Munira came to MDO Arvand for a loan, as she wants to buy fertilizer.  She thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Alla Kan Deme Group

texts.fr:
Orokia est une femme dynamique âgée de 43 ans et mère de 3 enfants. Elle travail depuis 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce des article précieux qui sont les bijoux et les perles. sa force est que vu son ancienneté est vent en gros et dispose d'un répertoire de client bien fourni. 
De plus elle s'approvisionne à bon prix à l’étrange.
Elle client de ACFIME depuis plusieurs années et respecter toujours ces engagements.Le crédit lui permettra de s'approvisionner en bijoux pour satisfaire ces clients
texts.en:
Orokia is a dynamic woman aged 43, mother of three children. She has been working for 10 years in the commercial sector selling precious items, that is, jewels and pearls. Her strength, in view of how long she has been in this sector, is in the wholesale trade and she has a big repertory of satisfied clients. Moreover, she supplies at a good price to overseas clients. 

Orokia has been a client of ACFIME for several years and always fulfills her commitments. The loan will allow her to stock up on jewelry so as to satisfy the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy jewelry to resell

loans.name: Giuliana

texts.en:
Giuliana is an artisan from Peru who specializes in silver filigree jewelry. She would like to invest in a bulk purchase of silver for her designs.

Giuliana has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is her story:

"As a child, I loved creating my own jewelry to wear at parties or to give as gifts to friends. My designs speak of tradition yet are modern, and they feature the harmony between metal, pearls and gemstones. I'd like to show the world the hand-crafted filigree styles developed in Peru over the centuries. I have researched the theme at length and my findings have led me to experiment with many great materials. Andean opal is my favorite.

"Silver is readily available at this time, which is not always the case. I would like to take advantage of that and stock up so that I can get to work on adding new pieces to my collection. Thank you for your assistance!"

Use the link below to view Giuliana's silver filigree jewelry on the NOVICA site:
"http://www.novica.com/kiva/4994"

loans.use: to invest in a bulk purchase of silver for her designs.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora has four kids and she is still making cheese. This time she needs a loan to buy cattle to produce more milk and more cheese. Flora works hard and her business is going well because she dedicates many hours and she is helped by her family. Flora hopes you can help her again, she is experienced and she is ready to work even harder.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Fanny Flor

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS, la socia continua dedicándose a brindar el servicio de transporte (movilidad escolar), la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Fanny Flor belongs to the Liderando Las Palmas communal bank.  She continues to provide school transportation service.  She is a responsible and diligent person.  

She wants to continue working at this job as it allows her to support her family.  

She is asking for a loan to take care of the maintenance of her car.  She is thankful for the loan and she promises to make the payments that have been established.

loans.use: to cover the maintenance of her car.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more chicken meat for her business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 52 years old from Dumanjug, Cebu. She is married and her husband work as a driver. 

Teresita is engaged in selling dried fish, sugar, mongo beans and salt. She is asking for a loan to buy stocks of dried fish, pay for tuition fees and buy food for family consumption. Based on her sales experience, the demand for dried fish is high and if she can stock and sell more, she can increase her income.

Teresita is eager to learn so she can make her business more successful and increase profitability.

loans.use: to buy stocks of dried fish, pay for tuition fees and buy food for family consumption

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Speaking with Gladys, it becomes obvious that she is a very hardworking,ever smiling and helpful woman, and that everything she does is for her family's benefit and wellbeing. She lives in a humble home in the town of Nkubu, along with her husband and their six children. She has always strived to give them a decent life and a good education. 

She has been doing agriculture for 37 years now. She makes money selling produce from her farm, including banana, eggs, and crops. She enjoys plowing her farm and watering her plants. Crop diseases pose a big challenge for her and also poor productivity. 

Gladys is seeking a loan to buy farm inputs. With the loan, she plans to buy good quality seeds and fertilizer, which will help increase soil fertility and productivity on her farm. Increased productivity will allow her to improve her quality of life and living standards. Through training from Juhudi Kilimo, she has learned about the culture of saving and she plans to use the increased income to improve her farming. This loan will go a long way in changing the life of Gladys and her family.

loans.use: to buy good quality seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rhymna

texts.en:
Rhymna is 45 years old and married. She has five children of school age and lives in Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Rhymna is a businesswoman who earns through her hog raising business. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance.

Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en: Fernanda is married and she has three children, one girl and two boys. She is very happy with her family, therefore she is interested in taking on a $1,500 loan from TRM to repair her house. She used this loan to buy stone, wood, sand and zinc. She is a farmer and her husband is a teacher.

loans.use: to buy cement, stone, sand and other materials .

loans.name: Erenia

texts.en:
Erenia is 71 years old. She is known in San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental for her fishing activities. She is a widow and has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) for a very long time. She is actively participating in the various programs and services that the co-op offers.

She hopes to live comfortably, with a greater income, which is why she applied for a loan to purchase new fishing nets. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that she has been given a priority, as a microfinance member of PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase new fishing nets

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis tiene 28 años de edad y vive con su esposa e hijo en una comunidad de Jinotega, al norte de Nicaragua. Su finca es de 5 manzanas de las cuales 2 son de café establecido. Esta propiedad, como en la mayoría de los casos es una herencia de su padre. Este es el segundo crédito que recibe de parte de la Asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC), a través de la cual está integrado al proceso de certificación Comercio Justo.

Para este año, este pequeño productor requiere un financiamiento para la compra de abono y fertilizantes que le permitan garantizar el mantenimiento de sus plantaciones de café, y con ello incrementar los rendimientos productivos de su finca.

 El sueño de José Luis es que su hijo llegue a graduarse de una carrera universitaria y tenga mejores condiciones que las que él puede darle ahora. Su esfuerzo y trabajo día a día es para apoyar a su familia y lograr su sueño en unos años.
texts.en:
José Luis is 28 years old and lives with his wife and son in the community of Jinotega in the northern part of Nicaragua. His farm measures 5 manzanas (approx. 8.5 acres) of which 2 manzanas (3.4 acres) have established coffee plants. This property, as in the majority of cases, was inherited from his father.

This is the second loan that he is receiving from the Asociacion Pueblos en Accion Comunitaria (PAC), through which he is in the process of becoming Fair Trade certified.  For this year this small producer needs financing so he can buy manure and fertilizers which will help him guarantee the maintenance of his coffee plants, and consequently increase the yield of his farm. 

Jose Luis' dream is for his son to graduate from university with a degree and to be in a  better situation than Jose Luis can provide for him now. His effort and his work day by day are to support his family and to achieve his dream in some years.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to maintain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Mario Esteban

texts.es:
Mario es un pequeño productor de café de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Su finca es 6 manzanas, de éstas 1 es de café. A sus 27 años; y con muchos años trabajando ayudando a su padre en las labores culturales del café, ha adquirido una pasión hacia la caficultura.

El promedio de su producción de café en los últimos tres años ha sido de 5 quintales pergamino, lo cual se ha propuesto mejorar con un adecuado manejo de sus plantaciones. Él está enfocado en mejorar los rendimientos y la calidad de su café. Para esto, Mario menciona que requiere un financiamiento que le permita adquirir los insumos y fertilizantes que demanda su plantación, y aplicarlos de manera oportuna para hacer frente a uno de los principales problemas que enfrenta el café, que son las plagas y enfermedades. Señala que, además estará trabajando en las labores culturales que demanda este cultivo para lograr resultados positivos.
texts.en:
Mario is a small coffee-producer from the northern part of Nicaragua. His farm covers 6 manzanas (1 manzana = 1.74 hectares), one of which is dedicated to growing coffee. He is 27 years old, and has spent many years helping his father, who passed on his passion for coffee cultivation, to grow coffee. 

His average coffee yield in the last three years has been 5 quintales of pergamino, which he hopes to improve by better management of his plantation. He is intent on improving his yield and the quality of the coffee. For this reason, Mario is requesting a loan to buy the necessary supplies and fertilizers for his plantation, and will apply them carefully to ensure his coffee is protected from pests and disease, which are the two main problems affecting coffee crops. He says that he will also be taking part in cultural activities associated with this crop to ensure positive results.

loans.use: to pay for necessary supplies and fertilizers for his plantation.

loans.name: Kantutitas De Alto Lima Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KANTUTITAS DE ALTO LIMA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Elsa es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de carne, venta de fresco y dulces, venta de mantas, venta de bolsas nailon, tienda de barrio. 
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Elsa es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de carne; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá hace diez años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de carne por mayor) que adquirirá de las comerciantes mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que brinda la institución.
texts.en:
The "Kantutitas de Alto Lima" communal bank is starting its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Alto Lima. It is made up of eight members and led by a board of directors. Elsa is the secretary. 

The members carry out various types of  businesses including meat sales, soft drink and sweet sales, blanket sales, plastic bag sales, and neighborhood store.

This loan will benefit women owners of microenterprises, such as Elsa. She indicated that she joined Pro Mujer by invitation from a friend who is a client of the institution.

Elsa has a business selling meat, this is work that she learned ten years ago from her mother. She is applying for this loan to increase capital (to buy meat wholesale) that she will get from the wholesale sellers of the city in El Alto. She will then sell the goods at her stand.

This work allows her to get an income to support her family. Elsa is in a common-low marriage and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Elsa answers that she likes the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy meat wholesale.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
El señor Edilberto tiene 53 años de edad, es padre de 4  hijos, vive con su esposa en su casa propia, su actividad principal es la caficultura,  es una persona muy reconocida por su trayectoria de trabajo y por su honradez.
Don Edilberto es conocido como un líder en la aldea, cuenta con más de 13 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad económica lo que la misma le ha generado muy buenos recursos para tener una solvencia económica en su hogar.
Don Edilberto con el crédito espera comprar abono para fertilizar su finca para que le mejore su producción, lo que le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de vida a él y toda su familia, con los ingresos que perciba le permitirá cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros.
Su sueño es seguir mejorando en su negocio.

Trojes, Honduras - Junio del 2015
texts.en:
Edilberto, aged 53, is father to four children, and lives with his wife in their own home. His main business activity is cultivating coffee, and he is well known for being hard-working and honest. 

Edilberto is one of the leaders of his town, and has been cultivating coffee for more than 13 years, earning well and providing for his household. Edilberto has requested a loan to buy fertilizer for his farm, in order to increase production, and thereby improve his and his family's quality of life. He will use the increased earnings he hopes to make to pay for family expenses and other financial commitments. His dream is to continue improving his business. 

Trojes, Honduras - June, 2015

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his business.

loans.name: Rosito

texts.en:
Rosito has broad experience in farming. He has mastered farming activities like growing, caring for plants, and harvesting, and he is earning income as well. Rosito has supported his family doing this type of work.

As a farmer, Rosito has nurtured his membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. He knows that he can always turn to the Cooperative for his financing needs. Recently, he applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a businessman who earns through his lodging house. He is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance. 

Recently, he applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks to build additional rooms to accommodate more lodgers and earn more income. He is on his way to renovating some areas of his lodging house.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Benedicto

texts.en:
Benedicto has a corn farm in Pagadian City. This is his primary source of income for his family. 

Benedicto makes it a point to have good land preparation to have maximum yield and will have good income. Recently, he needed an amount to pay for irrigation costs of which he loaned from Paglaum MPC. 

Benedicto wishes to sustain his business and be able to supply corn in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to pay for labor on irrigation to soften tillage pans

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is a 78-year-old widow and lives in San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She has enjoyed her meager pension every month, and it has supported her needs, especially in purchasing her maintenance medicines.

She has been a member of Paglaum MPC for over 10 years and has enjoyed the benefits she gets from the cooperative. She successfully repaid her previous loans and maintained her records with no defaults in payments.

Recently, she availed herself of another loan of PHP 40,000 to pay for medical examination and purchases of maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for medical examination and purchases of maintenance medicines

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 34 years old, married with one child. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell like soap, can goods, eggs, noodles, spices, etc.

Mary Grace has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell like soap, can goods, eggs, noodles, spices, etc

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica una mujer con 40 años edad, con tres hijos de 13, 15 y 16 años de edad, se dedica a la preparación y venta de alimentos desde hace poco.

En el momento Angélica se encuentra pasando por una situación económica un poco complicada, pero con su negocio y perseverancia ha podido salir de estos problemas y quiere proyectarse para ser una gran empresaria y un día no muy lejano tener un restaurante.

Para Angélica no hay nada imposible, ella quiere seguir trabajando con el deseo de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.

Pero ella sabe que de la mano de Interactuar y los prestadores de Kiva sus deseos se cumplirán.

Desea solicitar un préstamo para la compra de insumos para la prepración de almuerzos y productos fritos, realizar adecuaciones locativas en matería de mejora de imagen visual e ir comprando sillas y mesas para asemejar su negocio a un restaurante.
texts.en: Angelica is a 40 year old woman with three children who are 13, 15 and 16 years old. She has recently started preparing and selling food. At the moment, Angelica is going through a somewhat difficult financial situation; but with her business and perseverance she has been able to get out of those problems and wants to become a great entrepreneur, and not long from now, to run a restaurant. There is nothing impossible for Angelica; she wants to continue working with the desire of improving the conditions of her house, and of giving her children a better quality of life. She knows that, thanks to Interactuar and the Kiva lenders, her wishes will be fulfilled. She is looking for a loan to buy ingredients to prepare lunches and fried food, to make general improvements to the workplace and to carry on buying tables and chairs to convert her business into a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy food items and transform her business into a restaurant.

loans.name: Brenda Janeth

texts.es: BRENDA JANETH: Es una señora alegre y luchadora de 45 años de edad, pertenece a la etnia miskita, madre soltera de 5 hijos que estudian su carrera universitaria y secundaria. Antes de solicitar este crédito, trabajó con pequeños créditos como integrante del Grupo Solidario Wuilmer, pero ahora se ha independizado y está solicitando su primer préstamo en la modalidad individual para aumentar los productos que oferta en su pequeño negocio de venta de frito, chiverías, gaseosas y refrescos naturales. Su sueño es llegar a tener una panadería y refresquería, que le genere más ganancia y poder  crear las condiciones que le permitan a ella y a su familia tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Brenda Janeth is a a happy and determined 45-year-old of Miskito ethnic origin. She is a single mother with 5 children who are studying for a university degree or at secondary school. Prior to asking for this loan, she worked with small loans as a member of the Wuilmer Solidarity Group but now she is working independently and is asking for her first loan as an individual. This is to increase the products she offers in her small business selling fried food, snacks, fizzy drinks and natural juices.

Her dream is to have a bakery and snack bar one day which will generate more profit and to be able to create the conditions which enable her and her family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients for making fried food and natural juices.

loans.name: Tuliya Group

texts.en:
Furaha (center) is one of the five woman from group. Tuliya. She has applied for another loan from Wezesha project to buy more petrol to sell and to increase her income. 

The group's last loan with Wezesha project finished without any difficulty so they are more confident moving into this new round. With the anticipated profit, Furaha is planning to pay the school fees so she can educate each of her six children properly.

loans.use: to purchase petrol

loans.name: Tulinde Group

texts.en:
Aline (far right) is a hardworking woman and was born in the Eastern Democratic Republic of Congo city of Uvira in 1970 and where she still lives. She is the mother of ten children. Aline sells fish and she has five years of experience doing business and through which she supports her family. Her husband is unemployed and she is the one who takes care of all the family. 

She is asking a new loan from Wezesha Project in order to increase her business size and make more money daily.

loans.use: to purchase small fish for sale, as the sole breadwinner of the family

loans.name: Alegria Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ALEGRIA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Cascada, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de productos de limpieza, venta de ropa, venta de comida, venta de regalos, venta de zapatos, venta de cereales, venta de guantes, venta de mantillas. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maria es integrante, ella indica que ingreso a Pro Mujer por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia desde hace varios años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de chompas y camisas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "Alegria" communal bank will begin its second loan cycle at Pro Mujer's regional office in Cascada. The group has eight members and is run by a board of directors that has María as president. The members have different types of businesses, including ones selling: cleaning products, clothes, meals, gifts, shoes, cereals, gloves and mantillas.

This loan will benefit small businesses in María's group. María herself says that she joined Pro Mujer following an invitation from a friend who is also a member of the organisation. María currently has a business selling clothing, She says that she learned this trade on her initiative some years ago.

This loan will be used to increase assets (buying sweaters and shirts in bulk) that María will bebuy from bulk sellers in the city of El Alto and then sell at her business. This work allows María to earn an income in order to support her family financially. María is single and has four children.

When asked what is she likes about Pro Mujer, María says that she likes the training and health support that is offered.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and shirts in bulk.

loans.name: Enock

texts.fr: Enock, âgé de 49 ans, vit en union libre et a deux enfants. Il tient une boutique de produits alimentaires tout près de sa maison. Ce n'est pas la première fois qu'il fait appel au microcrédit, et il a remboursé avec succès les crédits qui lui avaient été accordés. Il fait une nouvelle demande de prêt afin d'acheter plus de produits qu'il pourra proposer à la vente. Il rêve d'améliorer sa condition de vie et offrir un lendemain meilleur à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Enock is 49 years old and has a partner and two children. He runs a shop selling food products close to his home.

This is not the first time that he has sought a micro-loan, and he has been able to reimburse his previous loans successfully.

Enock is seeking a new loan in order to buy more products to resell. 

He dreams of improving his living conditions and providing a better future to his children.

loans.use: to buy sacs of flour and rice

loans.name: Cesar Andrés

texts.es: Cesar de 20 años, es un carismático joven residente en un barrio ubicado en Barranquilla en donde aperturó su almacén misceláneo en el año 2014, esta idea de negocio fue propuesta por su madre quien se ha dedicado al comercio por muchos años y le sugirió a su hijo que siguiera sus pasos.  Cesar muy entusiasta, todos los días a partir de las 8 a.m. recibe en su local a transeúntes, vecinos y amigos de su comunidad quienes realizan compras de diferentes tipos de artículos como colonias y perfumes, cosméticos, accesorios, cremas corporales y demás, así mismo ofrece servicio de llamadas y fotocopiadora. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo que invertirá en nuevo surtido para su almacén; colonias, cremas, cosméticos y demás.  Sus compras las realiza a distribuidoras nacionales y como su meta es incrementar sus ventas, su estrategia es fidelizar a su clientela mediante artículos de calidad y a buenos precios. Él desea iniciar una carrera universitaria que le permita  administración de su negocio y ser exitoso.
texts.en: Cesar is 20 years old and is a charismatic young man who lives in a neighborhood located in Barranquilla where he opened a general store in 2014.  The idea for this business came from his mother, who has been dedicated to the business for many years and suggested that her son follow her footsteps. Cesar is very enthusiastic.  Everyday beginning at 8am he begins receiving shoppers at his locale, many walkers, neighbors and friends from his community who buy all kinds of different products such as colognes, perfumes, cosmetics, accessories, body cremes and other items.  He also offers phone and photocopy services.  Currently he is applying for a loan from Kiva, his first financing with Kiva's field partner Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will invest in new inventory for his store, buying things like colognes, cremes, cosmetics and other items.  He makes his purchases through national distributors and his goal is to increase his sales.  His strategy involves being faithful to his customers by offering high quality merchandise at good prices.  He wants to begin a University career which will permit him to manage his business and be successful.

loans.use: invest in new inventory for his store, buying things like colognes, cremes, cosmetics and other items.

loans.name: Ana Margarita

texts.es: Ana tiene  37 a años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en casa de su propiedad junto a sus tres hijos de 17, 10 y 4 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y con buenas referencias personales por parte de sus vecinos que a diario la buscan en  su negocio el cual  es una carnicería donde distribuye carne de cerdo, de res y chorizos el cual está ubicada en el mercado central cerca de su casa, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y amabilidad que ella tiene a la hora de vender y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunas de las necesidades en su hogar. Ana  desea  mejorar su vivienda y brindar a su familia una mejor condición de vida  pero debido a que no cuenta con el capital para invertir a tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: ladrillo, arena y cemento para continuar la construcción de las paredes de su vivienda las cuales son de lamina, ella espera contar con este crédito y así poco a poco poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ana, aged 37, is  a single mother, and lives in her own home with her three children, aged 17, 10 and 4. She is a very hard-working person, with excellent personal references from her neighbours, who are regular customers at her business. 

Ana has a butcher's stall in the central market located close to her home, and sells pork, beef and chorizo. She has many customers thanks to her affordable prices and friendliness, and as a result manages to earn enough to maintain her household. 

Ana  would like to make some improvements to her home, and give her family a better quality of life, Owing to her lack of capital, she has requested a loan from FUSAI in order to pay for bricks, sand and cement in order to continue rebuilding the walls of her home, which are currently made of metal sheeting. She hopes to receive this loan, which will enable her, little by little, to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand and cement to continue building the walls of her home.

loans.name: Victor Antenor

texts.es:
Victor Antenor tiene 67 años de edad, conviviente , sin  hijos a su cargo , vive en casa propia;  en una zona rural, del distrito de Oyotún que pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, Costa norte de Perú, en esta comunidad la población se dedica mayormente a la agricultura, comercio, ganadería.

Victor se dedica a brindar servicio de jornaleria;  hace 30 años, con muy buenas referencias laborales y personales, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de herramientas como son tablas, burros de madera, entre otros para su trabajo esto con la finalidad de brindar mejores servicio a sus clientes,  de esta manera generar mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victor Antenor is 67 years old and lives with his partner in his own home without any children. He lives in a rural area within the district of Oyotún, which belongs to Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region of Peru's northern coast. People in this community work mainly in agriculture and retail.

Victor works providing services as a laborer, and has been doing this for thirty years. He has very good personal and work references, and is requesting this loan to invest in fixed assets. He will buy tools and supplies like sawhorses, planks, and other items for work. His goal is to provide better service to his customers so that he can make more income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Chaudhry's Group

texts.en:
These are the members of Kotli Malian 04 group. This group is formed at a native village Kotli Malian, in District Gujranwala, Pakistan. The group consists of three farmers to get financial facility from JWS, a local lender in Gujranwala.

Chaudhry is 37 years old, he is a young farmer and the leader of the group. He lives in his house with his life partner. He has 6 dependents in his family. He has been growing rice and wheat for 19 years. He sells his products at different markets located close to his home. The money he earns from his sales is able to meet some of his household expenses. He is applying a loan to purchase 20 bags of fertilizer, 2 bags of quality rice seeds, 5 boxes of pesticides and manure to continue with his work and earn a better income.

He is hoping to increase his yield after using this loan. He dreams to better feed his family. He is happy and committed to pay his loan without any delay.

loans.use: To purchase agriculture inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Asmat's Group

texts.en:
Asmat is the leader of a group of three farmers. He is a 40 years old married farmer. Four of his children go to school and he has eight dependents in his family. He is a resident of village “Kotli Malian” in District Gujranwala, Pakistan. He is standing in the middle and raising his hand in this photo.
He has been a farmer for 20 years. He learned farming from his father and he is very thankful. He grows rice and wheat in his land to earn a income to feed his family. He buys farming supplies for his crops from local market.
With the loan he requests, he plans to buy 25 sacks of fertilizer, five boxes of insecticide and fee to plow the land.
He would like to use his profits to expand his farming business. He also plans to encourage his children to study as much as possible. He is grateful to Kiva lenders and he promises to repay on time.

loans.use: To purchase agriculture inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es: Evangelina de 54 años de edad, habita en vivienda familiar en compañía de sus hijos de 30, 35 años de edad  y un sobrino de 22 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante manteniendo la economía de su familia,  además recibe el apoyo de sus hijos con algunos gastos básicos del hogar. Evangelina posee una venta de tortillas y además vende pupusas por encargo, su sobrino le ayuda en el negocio, debido a que tiene un gran número de personas que llegan a comprar a su negocio.   Ella desea construir una habitación dormitorio para brindarle una mayor comodidad a su familia, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: hierro, arena, cemento, ladrillo, etc., para construir las paredes de un cuarto de habitación.
texts.en:
Evangelina, aged 54, lives in her family home along with her children, aged 30 and 35, and a niece, aged 22. She is a very hard-working and determined woman, who has managed to provide for her family, and receives help from her children towards household costs. 

Evangelina sells tortillas and pupusas (a local specialty, similar to tortillas) to take away, and is helped by her niece because she has so many customers. She would like to build a bedroom in her home, so that her family will be more comfortable, and has requested a loan from FUSAI to buy iron, sand, cement, bricks, etc., in order to construct the walls for a bedroom.

loans.use: to buy iron, sand, cement, bricks, etc. for constructing a new bedroom in her home.

loans.name: Maria Beyanid

texts.es:
María una señora con 53 años, dedicada a la preparación y venta de comida, un negocio que monto hace poco en la casa donde reside, de allí logra tener las ganancias mínimas para cubrir sus necesidades.
Trabaja todos los fines de semana durante 8 horas.

María solicita un crédito con el cual comprar una estufa industrial, los insumos e ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus comidas, con esto mejorar sus ventas e incrementar sus ganancias.

Su meta es ahorrar parte del dinero obtenido para mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda, pues su estado no es el mejor.

Aporte al sueño de María, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Maria is a 53 year old woman who works preparing and selling food, a business which she recently started in her home.  From there she manages to earn a basic income to cover necessities. She works every weekend for 8 hours.

Maria is applying for a loan with which she will buy an industrial cooker, supplies and the ingredients necessary for the preparation of her food.  This will improve her sales and increase her income.

Her goal is to save some of her income in order to improve her home as it's not in a good state.

Support Mary's dream and make the loan possible.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven, supplies and the ingredients necessary for the preparation of her food.

loans.name: Nobesita

texts.en:
Nobesita is a businesswoman from Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 46 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari [general] store and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family.

Nobesita is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

Nobesita continues to look for better business opportunities -- proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is aged 55 years, married to Roceta and he supports six children.  He has been selling clothes in the market for the last two years and the business earns him KES 4,000 per month. 

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase more stocks of clothes for sale to clients and meet both client and family needs. He plans to use gained profit to purchase a dairy cow for milk production and also purchase chicks for rearing. 

His hope is to expand his business sectors and educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of clothes for sale to clients and meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is responsible and dedicated in her work as a tailor. This is her only source of income, and she is very grateful for her life and being allowed to be independent. She has a business producing school uniforms and carrying out repairs to clothes. This business has given her the opportunity to work and survive.

Teresita applied for a loan in order to expand her business and increase production. She will buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies. This will allow her to generate more income and enable her to cater tailoring services.

loans.use: to buy additional textiles, buttons and sewing supplies.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en:
Pablita is 48 years old, is married and lives at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. In order to earn a living, she takes in and raises pigs from her neighborhood.

With a desire to earn more, Pablita decided to raise pigs on her own as well. Through Pauglam PC she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglets and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 14,000 PHP to buy additional bags of animal feed.

She really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, in addition to the income of her husband. Someday she wants to build another concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to purchase bags of animal feed.

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 51 years old, is married and lives at Lumban, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari [general] store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her.

Elisa was able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase additional merchandise inventories available for sale such as canned goods, condiments, confectioneries and other consumable items.

In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise inventories available for sale such as canned goods, condiments, confectioneries and other consumable items.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 58 years old, married, has two children of adult age, and lives at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur.

Carmelita signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start up a sari-sari [general] store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. She was able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days.

Carmelita wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she requested a loan to purchase canned goods, sugar, milk, coffee, condiments and other consumable items.

In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, sugar, milk, coffee, condiments and other consumable items

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Gareeb's Group

texts.en:
Gareeb is a 48 years old married farmer. He has 5 dependents in his family. He is standing in this photo by raising his hand and holding a booklet. He is a leader of the group of three farmers. He is a resident of village “Chak Sadhoo”, District Gujranwala, Pakistan.
He has over 25 years experience in cultivating the land, he grows rice and wheat in his farm. He wants to better feed his children and dreams to send them to good schools.
This business generates a income to support his family and pay his debts. He inherited the business from his family and learned to run it, thanks to his father who taught him everything.
He is asking for the loan to buy supplies for his rice crop. He has to buy 15 bags of fertilizer, 2 bags of quality rice seeds, 5 boxes of pesticides and pay fee labors who prepare land for his rice crop. These inputs will increase his crop output. 
His greatest wish is to construct a house. He works very hard in his fields to save enough resources to buy it. He knows that in the future he will obtain it.

loans.use: To purchase agriculture inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Denis

texts.es:
Denis es un joven emprendedor  que vive en una alejada comunidad al norte de Nicaragua. Desde pequeño soñó con dedicarse a la caficultura, meta que ha cumplido. Su finca es de 4 manzanas, de las cuales 2 son de café. Su producción anual promedio en los últimos tres años ha sido de 80 quintales de café pergamino. 

Para este año, él requiere un financiamiento a corto plazo para garantizar el mantenimiento de su plantación de café, y garantizar la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que aseguren la nutrición de las plantas para obtener una buena cosecha. 

Este financiamiento, sumado a otro proyecto de inversión que se ha propuesto para mejorar la productividad y calidad de su café, ayudarán a este productor a incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en:
Denis is a young entrepreneur who lives in a remote community in northern Nicaragua.  He has dreamed of being a coffee grower since he was very young, and he has achieved this goal. His farm covers 6.96 acres, two of which are devoted to coffee. His average annual production for the last three years has been 80 quintals [about 8,000 lbs.] of pergamino coffee [coffee beans with the parchment, or skin].

For this year, he needs a short-term loan to guarantee the maintenance of his coffee field and to purchase supplies and fertilizers that will assure the nutrition of the plants in order to obtain a good harvest.

This loan, along with another investment project that he has planned to improve the productivity and quality of his coffee, will help this producer increase his income and improve his family’s conditions.

loans.use: to guarantee the maintenance of his coffee field, and to purchase supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Karamat's Group

texts.en:
Karamat is 56 years old farmer from Bhudary a village in Gujranwala, Pakistan. He didn't have the opportunity to continue in school. He is married and has three children, he and his wife take care of them. His wife is a household lady and do help him for their better family life. He is the leader of group of three farmers. He is standing in the middle by raising his hand in this photo.
He has been farming for last 28 years. He learned this work from his father and he is thankful to him. He grows rice and wheat in his land to better feed and meet his family’s day to day expenses. This business is his main source of income.
He needs the loan to buy 15 bags of fertilizer, 2 bags of quality rice seeds and 5 boxes pesticide for his rice crop. With the loan, he will be able to prepare the land in time. He hopes to increase his yield after using this loan. 
He dreams about sending his children in good schools. He wishes you can help him to fulfill his dream, he promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: To purchase agriculture inputs such as fertilizer, pesticide, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Danniel

texts.en:
Danniel is 67 years old, a widower, has 2 children of adult age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. He is a welder and owns a welding shop on their place. He sign up for membership with Paglaum MPc and have enjoyed the benefits and services of the cooperative. 

Currently, he is taking another loan of PHP 50,000.00 to purchase welding rods, round bars, plain sheets and other materials for his welding shop. He hopes that he can pay his amortization with the cooperative promptly to maintain his good records with the cooperative.

loans.use: to purchase welding rods, round bars, plain sheets and other materials for welding shop

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita has always the enthusiasm of farming. She has cultivated their farm land in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte and has yield good earnings doing this type of work. 

Recently, she applied a loan to pay for land and seedbed preparations. This will ensure that the rice field is ready for planting. Margarita knew that she has to get things right to yield more income for this cropping season.

loans.use: to pay for land and rice seedbed preparations

loans.name: Rolivie

texts.en:
Rolivie is 46 years old, married, and a resident of Talairon, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a sari-sari (convenience) store that gives her a meager income to support the needs of her family. Rolivie is on her way to completing a project to build a house so that her family can live comfortably. 

Rolivie is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to purchase hollow blocks and bags of cement to finish building her house.

loans.use: to purchase hollow blocks and bags of cement to finish building her house

loans.name: Cornelio

texts.en:
Cornelio is 74 years old. He is a widow who lives at Tubod, Aloran-Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. Cornelio receives a monthly pension that primarily supports his medical needs such as maintenance medicines. He learned about Paglaum MPC and the services it can extend to pensioners like him. 

Cornelio is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to purchase maintenance medicines. He is looking forward to more success for Paglaum so that it can continue to serve more clients like him.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines

loans.name: Cheryl

texts.en:
Cheryl is 34 years old, single and a resident of Guisokan, Doña Josefa, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. 

She owns and operates a fishing boat that gives her an income that support the needs of her ailing parents. She is a member of Paglaum MPC and all her financial needs was addressed by the cooperative. 

Currently, she avails another loan of PHP 14,500.00 to buy diesel, lubricants for the fishing boat and fishing equipment like nets and hooks.

loans.use: to buy diesel, lubricants for the fishing boat and fishing equipment like nets and hooks

loans.name: Crispina

texts.en:
Crispina is married and lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She is into vegetables vending and she owns a vegetable stalls on their local market. This business has contributed to their family income aside from the salary she receives as a teacher. 

Currently, Crispina avails loan of PHP 7,000.00 as additional working capital in purchasing additional stocks like vegetables, spices and others for her business. Crispina believes that more stocks available for sale means more profit.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks like vegetables, spices and others for vegetable vending business

loans.name: Daphne

texts.en: Daphne is 69 years old, widowed and a resident of Digson, Bonifacio-Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a mini-grocery store. She is in this kind of retailing business and has mastered it. That is the primary reason she has high sales. She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC and enjoys the benefits she gets as a member. Recently, she availed a loan of PHP 35,000 to restock her store with consumable items such as canned goods, oil, soy sauce, vinegar and others.

loans.use: to restock store with consumable items such as canned goods, oil, soy sauce, vinegar and others.

loans.name: Yllka

texts.en: Yllka needs your financial help again and for the same reason; to buy inventory of used clothing to resell

loans.use: to stock up on inventory of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Nelia works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice.  Nelia is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy materials for the maintenance of her motorcycle transport business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Nelia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials for the maintenance of her motorcycle

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor tiene 39 años de edad habita en vivienda de familiar desde hace 38 años junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos los cuales son el motivo por quien luchar ya que junto a su esposo le están dando el estudio necesario para que sean grandes personas en la vida. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías ya que se ha dado cuenta que sus ingresos no son lo necesario para cubrir los gastos del hogar ha decidido instalar una pequeña crianza de pollos ya que le permitirá tener otra mejor calidad de vida para su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: pollos, concentrado y vitaminas para su crianza y venta de pollos.
texts.en:
Flor is 39 years old and she has lived in her family home for 38 years. She lives with her husband and her three sons which are her motivation and reason for working hard.  

Together with her husband, they are giving them the education necessary in order for them to be great people in life.  

She earns a living making craft products but she has realised that her income is not sufficient to cover the household costs.  

She has decided to set up small chicken farm which will allow her to improve her family's quality of life.  She is therfore applying for a loan from FUSAI in order to buy: chickens, chicken feed and vitamins for the rearing and sale of chickens.

loans.use: to buy: chickens, chicken feed and vitamins for the rearing and sale of chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in drinks, candies, basic grains, juices, etc., to increase sales in her business.

loans.name: Nidia Celina

texts.es: Nidia de 40 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijas, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en su pick up su hijo mayor le ayuda en las ventas, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a las ventas e inicio con capital propio, con las ventas que realiza ha logrado salir adelante, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras por mayor y así tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Nidia, 40 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her three daughters. She earns a living selling fruits and vegetables in her pick-up. Her oldest child helps her with the sales. She has been dedicated to this work for 10 years and started with her own money. With the sales that she makes she has managed to succeed. 

She is seeking a loan to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale and thereby have a better income.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Caledonia Corazon Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por  5 personas responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “CALEDONIA CORAZÓN” una de ellas es la Sra. Elizabeth  de 33 años soltera  y con 1 hijo, se dedica ya hace 1 año a la venta de productos de belleza   todos los días con el mérito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos, Con el fruto de su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar en la educación de su menor  hijo. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es que su hijo sea profesional es por eso  que trabaja mucho, Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más mercadería (esmalte,perfumes etc) y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a la Sra. Elizabeth se encuentra sentada y se le distingue con una chompa color azul marino a lados de su menor hijo, se despide con un abrazo a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
Caledonia Corazón is a group made up of 5 people dedicated to different commercial activities. One of the members of this group is Ms. Elizabeth. She is 33 years old, is single and has one child. For one year she has worked every day selling beauty products in a small store with the hope of getting ahead and being able to pay for her young child to go to school. With the product of her efforts, she has been able to improve her home and support her child’s education.  

She continues to improve her business. Her biggest hope is that her son will become a professional and because of this, she works a lot. Given this loan, she will invest it to purchase more merchandise (nail polish, perfume, etc.) and thus be able to have more income. Ms. Elizabeth is shown above seated next to her young son and wearing a navy blue jacket. She sends hugs to Kiva and Edaprospo and gives thanks for the funding of her loan, which makes her progress possible.

loans.use: to buy fabric, string, etc.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José de 55 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador que vive muy feliz en su casa propia y humilde, actualmente apoya a sus dos hijos de 14 y 18 años de edad, ya que a pesar de no vivir con ellos trata de darles lo mejor. José se caracteriza por ser un hombre con ganas de superación. Él desde hace 24 años se dedica a reparar joyas de diferentes materiales, gracias a ello hace 24 años logro instalar una joyería y relojería en su hogar, en su negocio se dedica a la elaboración de joyería de oro y plata así como también reparaciones de relojes lo cual realiza diariamente. José solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: oro, plata, pinzas, tenazas, lupa, entre otros productos necesarios para su trabajo.
texts.en: José, 55 years old, is a very hard-working man who lives happily in his own humble house. Currently he supports his two children, ages 14 and 18, since despite not living with them, he tries to give them the best. José is characterized as a man with desire to improve himself. For the past 24 years, he has works repairing jewelry of different materials. Thanks to this, 24 years ago, he managed to establish a jewelry and watch shop in his house. In his business, he works making gold and silver jewelry, and also repairing watches which he does daily. José asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in gold, silver, pliers, a magnifier and other products necessary for his work.

loans.use: to invest in gold, silver, pliers, a magnifier and other products necessary for his work.

loans.name: Beverly

texts.en: Beverly is 40 years old, married, has seven school-age children, and resides at Maloro, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is employed as an Emergency Hospital Aide while her husband is a construction worker. During her day off, she sells different snacks to the neighborhood, as well as her beauty and cosmetic products. She has to work hard because she has seven children who are studying. Through her hard work, she gains income that primarily supports the needs of her family. Beverly acts as an Insurance Coordinator. Recently, she availed a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase inventory like beauty soaps, cosmetics, and fragrances for buy and sell business. She hopes that through this, she can augment her income and improve their general living condition.

loans.use: to purchase inventory like beauty soaps, cosmetics, and fragrances for buy and sell business.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en: Fe is 53 years old, married, has three children of adult age and is a resident of Silanga, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She has a piggery business that existed for more than 20 years. This gives her additional income to provide the needs of her family. She signed up for membership with Paglaum MPC. She avails her sixth loan of PHP 12,500 to purchase sticks, nails, plywood and galvanized iron sheets for her house renovation. She is grateful for the cooperative because she is supported by her financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase sticks, nails, plywood and galvanized iron sheets for her house renovation.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is managing her eatery business in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. This has been doing well supporting the needs of the family. She has local customers and would also accept catering for added income. 

Recently, she borrowed an amount to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business. She wants to expand her business and would be more happy to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more kilos of meat and spices for her eatery business

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 66 years old. She is a widow who is a resident of Dullan, Aloran-Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. Maria lives with her children and she uses her pension to support herself and cover her maintenance medicines. 

Maria is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase her maintenance medicines. She is hoping that PMPC will continue to serve more clients who are not only pensioners like herself but also involved in production.

loans.use: to purchase maintenance medicines

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is 74 years old. She is a widow who is a resident of Palayan, Aloran-oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. For the past 40 years, Juana has operated a banana plantation on her land. Her farm has provided for the needs of her family and allowed her to send her children to school. For Juana, farming is her life. Even as she's getting older, she never wants to stop farming and she continues to pursue it with passion. 

Juana is requesting a loan from PMPC to purchase bags of fertilizer for her banana plantation. Having enough fertilizer will give her more harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her banana plantation

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: Rosalina is 63 years old, widowed and lives at Bintana, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store), banana plantation and a parcel of coco land. All of those give her an income that supports the needs of her family. Recently, she took loans from the cooperative in an amount of PHP 13,500 to restock store with condiments, confectioneries and consumable goods.

loans.use: to restock her store with condiments, confectioneries and consumable goods

location.town: Tangub - Bintana, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Herginia

texts.en: Herginia is 36 years old, married and a resident of Bintana, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a rice field with her husband as the farmer. This is her primary source of income and it sustains the needs of her family. She is on her way to renovating their house and she asks for a loan to purchase bags of cement and to pay for her workers.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and to pay workers for house renovation.

location.town: Tangub - Bintana, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: El Diamante 13 Group

texts.es:
Provenientes de una comunidad veracruzana rodeada por plantaciones de caña, se integró el grupo El Diamante 13. El nombre fue elegido ya que consideran que el grupo debe ser pulido para que se vuelva perfecto justo como la piedra preciosa; en tanto que el trece hace referencia al número de miembros. Ellos son: María R., Angélica R. y María Luisa V. quienes venden abarrotes; María, antojitos típicos; Olga, recipientes de plástico y tiempo aire; Iris, zapatos; Patricia, pollo; Flora, pan; Lirio, costuras; Francisca y Marbella, cosméticos; Angélica M., recipientes de plástico y Jorge quien brinda servicio de taxi.
   Doña Flora es una mujer sumamente responsable, es madre de un joven de 16 años y un niño de 8. Tras convertirse en madre soltera decidió implementar una actividad que le sirviera para solventar los gastos de toda su familia, así comenzó a vender pan. En un inicio vendía dos veces a la semana recorriendo las calles de su comunidad, en promedio vendía de 300 a 350 piezas de pan fresco. No obstante el crecimiento ha sido gradual y actualmente vende 1000 piezas de pan y 300 volovanes por semana aproximadamente. Con la ayuda del préstamo anterior pudo comprar una motocicleta pues de esta manera las reparticiones del producto son más rápidas y abarcan más territorio. Su éxito proviene tanto del sabor del pan cocido en horno de piedra y fuego de leña, como por los precios, la accesibilidad y el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes. “Hoy en día compro el pan, mas tendré mi propia panadería la cual será el patrimonio para mis hijos” comenta satisfecha. 
   Aunque las ventas aumentan en temporada de lluvia también resulta más complicado transportar la mercancía por lo tanto su propósito ahora es comprar un automóvil para transportar de forma segura el pan. Por otro lado desea iniciarse en la cría de cerdos y para ello comprará un cerdo hembra, alimento y pan.
   El grupo Diamante 13 agradece por la confianza depositada en ellos lo único que desean es intensificar sus negocios y generas más ganancias. 
*La fotografía en la casa de Doña Flora quien viste blusa color azul, el taxi que se logra apreciar es propiedad de Jorge.
texts.en:
Coming from a community in Veracruz that's surrounded by cane plantations, they form the group El Diamante 13. The name was chosen because the group must be polished in order to become perfect just like the precious stone, while the number references the amount of members. They are: María R., Angélica R., and María Luisa V, who sell groceries; María, typical snacks; Olga, plastic containers and air time; Iris, shoes; Patricia, chickens; Flora, bread; Lirio, sewing; Francisca and Marbella, cosmetics; Angélica M., plastic containers; and Jorge, who provides taxi service.

Mrs. Flora is an incredibly responsible woman. She is the mother of a 16 year old and 8 year old. After becoming a single mother, she decided to begin an activity that could help her to solve her family's needs; thus, she started selling pan. In the beginning, she started by selling twice a week, running through the streets of her community, selling on average 300-350 pieces of fresh bread. Nevertheless, growth has been gradual and she currently sells 1000 pieces of bread and 300 puff pastries each week. With help from her previous loan, she was able to buy a motorcycle which made distribution quicker and allowed her to cover more territory. Her success comes from the flavor of the bread baked in stone ovens over a wood fire, as well as prices, accessibility, and her amiable treatment of customers. "Nowadays I buy bread, but I will have my own bakery which will be my legacy for my children," she commented, satisfied.

Even though sales increase in the rainy season, it becomes more complicated to transport her products, therefore her goal is now to buy a car to transport the bread more securely. Additionally, she wants to begin raising pigs and thus will buy a female pig, food, and bread.

The group El Diamante 13 is grateful for the trust placed in them. The only thing they want is to elevate their businesses and generate more income. 

*Photograph is in the house of Mrs. Flora, who wears a blue shirt; the taxi that one can barely see belongs to Jorge.

loans.use: To buy a pig, food and bread for resale. The profits will go towards buying a car.

loans.name: Phoxay Group

texts.en:
Bounmee’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  

Bounmee and his group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now he can shift to other pursuits.  Bounmee and his village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years; within this 2 years filter users, like Bounmee’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Faustino Carmelino

texts.es:
Faustino es un hombre de 26 años de edad, es soltero y tiene una linda familia de un hijo, ellos viven en una comunidad de Guiniales Sololá. Faustino con el afán de obtener sus ingresos y sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la elaboración de cortes típica, esta labor lo realiza el desde hace cuatro años,  para el este trabajo es muy importante pues es de donde proviene sus ingresos, pero él ahora ha decidido  comprar una cuerda de terreno para poder cultivar un poco y mejorar sus ingresos, aunque una de las dificultades que Faustino tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente por tal razón solicita un crédito para poder adquirir su terreno.
El gran sueño de Faustino es poder comprar tres telares para elaborar cortes tipos y satisfacer mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Faustino is a 26 year-old man. He is single and has a lovely family of one child. They live in a community of Guiniales Sololá. 

With a desire to earn an income and help his family get ahead, Faustino has been making typical clothing. He has been doing this for four years. 

This work is very important to him, because it is where his earnings come from, but now he has decided to buy a plot of land in order to be able to grow a few things and improve his income, although one of Faustino’s difficulties is that he does not have enough money. 

For this reason he is seeking a loan to be able to purchase his plot of land. His great dream is to be able to purchase three looms to create typical clothing and better satisfy his customers.

loans.use: to buy plot of land to farm.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 65 years old, a widow, with 8 children and lives at Dipolog, Zamboaga del Norte. She owns a snack vending business which she operates for over 5 years. 

Through this business, she earns meager income of PHP 450.00 per day. Recently, Norma avails another loan of PHP 7,000.00 to purchase materials for house renovation like sticks, nails, plywood, bags of cement, etc.. She is thankful to the cooperative because she was supported with her financial needs whether it is for business or house renovation business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation like planks, nails, plywood, bags of cement, etc.

loans.name: Suma Chuyma Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SUMA CHUYMA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Julia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, venta de comida, venta de pan, venta de zapatos, venta de coca, venta de accesorios para el hogar, venta de ropa para bebé, venta de abarrotes.
	
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Julia es integrante, ella indica ingreso a Pro Mujer  por la invitación de un asesor de crédito de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su mamá,  hace doce años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de detergentes, conservas y galletas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente, lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene y tiene siete hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que ofrece la institución.

En la foto aparecen diez personas porque también aparece la hija de la señora Mauricia, que es la señorita de chompa rojo, ya que en el día  desembolso vino a acompañar a su mamá.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Suma Chuyma” will start its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal de Collpani [Focal Center of Collpani]. The group is made up of 9 members and is led by a board of directors of which Julia is the president. The businesses of the group members are varied and include: a corner store, food sales, bread sales, shoe sales, coca sales, home good sales, baby clothing sales, and a grocery store. 

The loan that they are asking for will help each of the micro-entrepreneurs including Julia. Julia is married and has seven children. She joined Pro Mujer because she was invited to join by one of the organization’s loan officers. She currently has a corner store and said she learned this business from her mother 12 years ago. 

The loan that she is requesting will be used to increase capital (the purchase of detergent, canned goods and cookies in bulk), which she will buy from wholesalers in El Alto. Afterwards, she will sell it in her corner store. This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family economically. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the training and healthcare that the institution offers.

10 people appear in the picture because Mauricia’s daughter is featured. She is the woman wearing the red sweater and she accompanied her mother on the day of payment.

loans.use: to buy detergent, canned goods and cookies in bulk.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en: Salome is 58 years old, widowed, has four children of adult age and is a resident of Baybay Migcanaway, Tangub City, Misamis Occidental. She is employed as the caretaker of their Brgy. Hall and receives a meager honorarium. She also receives remittances from her children every month. Primarily, she signed up for membership with Paglaum so that she can avail the insurance benefits for future use. However, she was informed that she can avail other services like loan products, in an affordable amortization. By that, with the support of her children, she avails a loan of PHP 7,000 to purchase sticks, plywood, and nails and to pay workers for her house repair.

loans.use: to purchase sticks, plywood, and nails and to pay workers for house repairs.

loans.name: Ma. Marilou

texts.en:
Ma. Marilou is 45 years old. She is married with three school-aged children. Ma. Marilou is a resident of Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. For the past 15 years, she has been a farmer who earns approximately 30,000 PHP each harvest season. Ma. Marilou has learned about the financial assistance extended by PMPC to farmers like her.  She joined the cooperative in 2013 and found out that members receive not only financial services but also insurances. 

Ma. Marilou is requesting a 10,000 PHP loan to purchase bags of fertilizer and pesticide for her rice field. She hopes for success in her chosen business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pesticide for her rice field

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Susan works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell young coconut fruits business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending.  Susan is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase more young coconuts to sell for her buy and sell young coconut fruits business.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more young coconuts to sell

loans.name: Yesenia Noemy

texts.es:
Yesenia, de 35 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudio hasta segundo año de bachillerato, no continuo sus estudios porque decidió formar una familia, tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 12 años de edad, los cuales están estudiando.

Yesenia, vive solo con sus dos hijos y son los que dependen de ella y se dedica a la venta de comida típica desde hace 20 años, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a su madre quien siempre se ha dedicado a este negocio, para llegar hasta su negocio, ella tiene que caminar dos cuadras y su horario de trabajo es de 1:00 p.m. a 6:00 p.m. todos los días.

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar cerdos de engorde para obtener más ingresos dentro de un periodo cuando los venda y así poder ayudar económicamente a sus hijos, para que puedan seguir estudiando.

El sueño de Yesenia, es ampliar más su vivienda, para darle a su familia una más comodidades.
texts.en:
Yesenia, 35 years old, is a housewife. She completed the second year of secondary school. She didn't continue with her education because she decided to have a family. She has two children, ages 15 and 12, who are students.

Yesenia lives just with her two children and they are her dependents and she has worked selling traditional food for the past 20 years. She learned this work thanks to her mother who always has worked in this business. To get to her business, she has to walk two blocks and her work schedule is from 1:00 pm to 6:00 pm every day.

The loan that she is requesting is to purchase pigs to fatten to get more income within a period when she sells them and in this way she will be able to help her children economically so that they continue with their schooling. 

Yesenia's dream is to expand her house more, to give her family more conveniences.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to fatten.

loans.name: Roger Antonio

texts.es:
Roger, es un joven de treinta y siete años de edad, muy emprendedor, estudio una carrera técnica en cocina y trabajó en esto durante un tiempo, se dio cuenta que lo suyo era el comercio, fue así como le surgió la idea de poner una pulpería en su casa de habitación, la cual surtió de productos con un dinero que tenía ahorrado, en la actualidad su pulpería ha crecido notablemente y tiene posibilidades de mejorar aún más.
La oportunidad de incrementar las ventas de la pulpería de Roger, ha llegado, es por eso que él ha solicitado un préstamo para Kiva junto a MiCrédito, que le permita introducir a su negocio nuevas y variadas marcas de distintos productos, además que necesita comprar nuevos productos y unos estantes que mejoren su local. Es claro que este hombre va caminando hacia el éxito, en un futuro planea haber hecho de su local una distribuidora.
texts.en:
