Roger is a thirty-seven year old young man, very enterprising, who studied a technical degree in cooking and worked in this for some time. He realized that his path was commerce, and it was in this way that he came up with the idea of establishing a grocery store in his house, which he stocked with products with some money he had saved. Currently, his grocery store has grown noticeably, and has the possibility to improve even more.

The opportunity to increase Roger's grocery store sales has arrived. For this reason, he asks for a loan from Kiva with MiCrédito, which will allow him to introduce new and varied brands of various products. In addition, he needs to purchase new products and some shelves which will improve his retail space. It is clear that his man is on the road to success, in the future he plans to make his store into a wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase new products and some shelves to improve his retail space.

loans.name: Lakxmi

texts.en:
Lakxmi lives with her family in a village of Dhupguri in Jalpaiguri district. She is 47 years old and a housewife. Her husband is engaged in the fruit business and earns a meager income, quite insufficient for her family. Lakxmi is blessed with three daughters, and amongst them two are married. Her youngest daughter Lina, aged 23, is doing a master’s degree in geography from Kanpur University.

Extra efforts and sacrifices are always worth it when it comes to studies because studies are the only sure way to improve one’s quality of life. Lina is well aware of this, because she has always counted her goal as becoming a good teacher. Now she needs the guidance of private tutors in completing her master’s degree, but her parents are unable to afford this.

So, her mother Lakxmi is asking for a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to pay off her university fees and course fees and accomplish her dream. She will also purchase other necessary study materials for her daughter. She hopes that, in the long run, her daughter will establish herself as a competent teacher.

Lakxmi and her daughter (in the picture) are very much thankful to their generous lenders BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's master's degree education fees and pay for educational equipment.

loans.name: Agamani

texts.en:
Forty-seven-year-old Agamani is a homemaker who hails from Falakata, Alipurduar district. A mother of two children, a son and a daughter, Agamani always strives hard so that her children receive proper education, which she was deprived of in her childhood because of her family’s financial issues.

Her husband runs a small pathology clinic, and the inconsistent earnings from the business are spent on the household expenses. So, they are unable to provide their children with adequate study materials.

Her son, 22-year-old Abhijit, has just stepped into college and is studying for a B.A. (Bachelor of Arts) in his first year at Falakata College. He is a serious and studious boy. He has a long-cherished dream to be a teacher and wants to pursue a B. Ed. (Bachelor of Education) course. But, his parents are unable to provide the college fees regularly, and it is creating a burden on them. So, Abhijit thinks that his dream will be unfulfilled due to lack of money. In this situation, Abhijit’s mother Agamani has requested a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner).

With the help of this loan, she will purchase her son's study materials and books and pay his college fees. She will also enroll her son in some coaching centre to improve him so that he will be one step ahead towards his aim.

Agamani and Abhijit are very much thankful to their generous lenders.

loans.use: to pay for the education costs of her son's graduation degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase iron, metal, electrodes, tools,e tc. to be able to expand his production in his business.

loans.name: Tito

texts.en: Tito is a microfinance member of PMPC. He is 50 years old, widowed, and has a hog-fattening business in Dipolog, Zamboanga del Norte. This is how he supports his family with a meager income of PHP 5,000 per month. Recently, Tito availed a loan to purchase bags of cement and galvanized iron sheets for house renovation. He wants to improve his family's living conditions and maintain his membership with the Cooperative.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and galvanized iron sheets for house renovation.

loans.name: Erlin Donaldo

texts.es:
El  señor Erlin  tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su esposa, su actividad principal es la caficultura, actividad que le generan muy buenos recursos, cuenta con más de 10 años de dedicarse  a este tipo de actividad económica y para este año espera una muy buena producción. 
Don Erlin está  solicitando el préstamo para la compra de abono ya que por los momentos no cuentan con los recursos suficientes para abonar sus cultivos, espera que esta inversión le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y poder asi cubrir los gastos familiares y compromisos financieros, su sueños es mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familia y también tener una mejor estabilidad económica en el futuro, con el préstamo espera poder lograr sus sueños.

Trojes, Honduras - Junio  del 2015
texts.en:
Erlin  is 30 years old and lives with his wife. His main busienss is growing coffee, an activity which makes him a very good income. He has more than 10 years' experience working in this type of business and this year he is hoping for a very good yield.

Erlin is asking for the loan to buy manure since at the moment they do not have sufficient funds to fertilise his crops. He hopes this investment will allow him to improve his income to cover the family's expenses and financial commitments. His dream is to improve his living conditions and have financial stability at some point in the futures. With the loan, he hopes to be able to make his dreams a reality.
  
Trojes, Honduras - June 2015

loans.use: to buy manure for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase trees for cutting and making timber to sell to clients and meet client and family needs.

loans.name: Angela Rosa

texts.es:
Ángela es una señora con 33 años de edad, dedicada a la venta de mercancía desde, un negocio con el cual ha logrado un gran avance como persona y empresaria.
Trabaja todo el tiempo, pues su disposición para hacerlo son muchas.

Solicita un crédito el cual lo invertirá en la compra de diferentes tipos de calzado para dama, caballero y niño.
Con esto espera aumentar sus ventas y de tal manera mejorar sus ganancias

Sus sueños son muchos, pero los primordiales son comprar una vivienda nueva y pagarles la educación a sus hijos, pues son el motor de esta mujer seguir luchando.
texts.en:
Ángela is a 33-year-old woman who works selling merchandise. Through the business, she has achieved great growth as a person and as a businesswoman.

She works all the time, because she is very willing and able.

She is requesting a loan that she will invest in the purchase of various types of shoes for women, men, and children.

With this loan, she hopes to increase her sales and improve her income.

She has many dreams, but the most fundamental are to buy a new house and pay for her children's education. They are her motivation to continue working hard.

loans.use: to buy various types of shoes for women, men, and children

loans.name: Raquel Alicia

texts.es:
Raquel, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y su pareja es mecánico, tienen tres hijos, uno estudia tercer grado, otro segundo grado y el otro no estudia aún.

Raquel, tiene una tienda desde hace un año, inicio vendiendo helados en su casa, luego fue comprando más productos para vender; ahora vende pescado y otros mariscos, el negocio lo tiene en su casa y el horario de venta es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 6:00 p.m.

Raquel, necesita el crédito para surtir más su tienda con otros productos como detergentes, arroz, frijoles, pan, entre otros, con este préstamo mejorara el inventario de su tienda y sus ganancias serán mayores.

Sus sueños son, tener una tienda bien surtida y grande, además espera que sus hijos estudien y en un futuro puedan trabajar para ayudarle económicamente.
texts.en:
29-year-old Raquel went to school until ninth grade, is in a relationship, and her partner is a mechanic. She has three children. One is in third grade, one in second grade, and one is not yet going to school.

Raquel has opened a store one year ago. At first she sold ice cream from her house. Later she bought more products sell. Now she is selling fish and other seafood. Her business is located in her house and the opening hours are from 6 am until 6 pm.

Raquel needs this loan to increase her store's stock with more products like detergent, rice, beans, bread, and so on. With his loan she will improve her store's stock and her income will increase.

Her wish is to have a well stocked and big store. Furthermore she wants her children to study and help her financially in the future.

loans.use: to increase her store's stock with more products like detergent, rice, beans, bread, and so on.

loans.name: Berta Lina

texts.es:
Berta es una señora de 50 años de edad, dedicada a la preparación y venta de comida, un medio por el cual ha logrado salir adelante después del fallecimiento del esposo quien era el sostén del hogar.
Trabaja todos los fines de semana entre 8 y 10 horas.

Se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual lo invertirá en la compra de una carpa y arreglara el carro en el cual hace la preparación de los alimentos, ya que este se encuentra en mal estado y no es adecuado para la venta de esto.

Su principal sueño es mejorar las condiciones de su casa, ya que esta con el tiempo se ha ido deteriorando.

Como Berta hay miles de empresarios esperando de su ayuda, anímese, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Berta is a 50-year-old lady who prepares and sells food.  This has been the means by which she has managed to get by after the death of her husband, who was the breadwinner.  She works between eight and ten hours every weekend. 

She is requesting a loan, which she will invest in the purchase of a canopy; and she will repair the cart that she uses to prepare the food, as it is in bad condition and not fit for selling food. 

Her biggest dream is to improve the condition of her house, as it has been deteriorating over time. There are thousands of entrepreneurs like Berta who are hoping for your help; please make a loan.

loans.use: to purchase a canopy, and to repair the cart that she uses to prepare the food.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 41 years old, married and supports a family of two children.

She has been operating her retail shop for the last 19 years, earning KES 8,000 per month.

Rose has applied for her first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy a dairy cow for milk production. She will be able to to supply the milk to different shops for more income gain.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to educate her children.

Her future hopes and dreams are to be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production

loans.name: Catarina Nohemí

texts.es:
Catarina es una de las mujeres que se esmera día con día para ofrecerle a su familia lo mejor, ella tiene 32 años de edad, es feliz mente casada con una familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 3 y 7 años, ellos viven en una comunidad de Santo Tomas La Unión. Catarina para obtener sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de calzados, con este negocio tiene 12 años de realizarlo. Pero ella también es una de las grandes mujeres que  contribuye con la educación de su comunidad, porque trabaja como maestra de educación primaria. Catarina se ve a la necesidad de comprar un terreno donde ella pueda construir su casa, pero una de las dificultades que  tiene es  no contar con el dinero suficiente por tal motivo solicita un crédito para poder comprar el terreno.
El gran sueño de Catarina es que su negocio crezca para poder comprar un carro y movilizarse mejor.
texts.en:
Catarina is one of those women who makes a great effort each and every day to offer her family the best. She is 32 years old and is happily married with a family of two children between 3 and 7 years old. They live in a community of Santo Tomás la Unión. 

In order to earn her income, Catarina buys and sells footwear, a business she has been in for 12 years. But she is also one of the great women who contributes to education in the community because she works as a primary school teacher. 

Catarina sees the need to purchase a plot of land where she can build a house, but one of the difficulties she has is not having sufficient money. For this reason, she is asking for a loan in order to buy land.  

Catarina's greatest dream is for her business to grow so that she could buy a car and get around better.

loans.use: to buy a small plot of land.

loans.name: Mario Agapito

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 28 años de edad, es soltero cuenta con una familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 3 y 7 años, esta familia vive en una comunidad de San Andres Semetabaj
Mario para sacar adelante a su familia trabaja como jornalero con sus vecinos, el lleva cuatro años de realizar esta labor, pero para mejorar en sus ingresos en su tiempo libre se dedica a la agricultura. Mario ahora se ve a la necesidad de construir su propia casa porque su familia está creciendo y necesitan de más comodidad, aunque una de las dificultades  que él tiene es no contar con el dinero necesario para poder  construir por tal motivo solicita un crédito para comprar cemento, arena, piedrín, y block.
El gran anhelo de Mario es terminar la construcción de su casa y brindarle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Mario, 28, is a single dad of two children ages 3 and 7. His family lives in the community of San Andres Semetabaj. In order to care for his family, Mario works as a hired laborer for his neighbors. He has been doing this work for four years; in order to supplement his income he farms in his spare time. Now Mario needs to build his own house because his family is growing and needs more comfort. One of his difficulties is that he doesn't have the money he needs to build the home, which is why he asks for a loan to buy cement, sand, gravel and cinder block. Mario's greatest wish is to finish building his home and to give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel and cinder block.

loans.name: Navangmon Group

texts.en: Som understands the difference the water filter can make for her family and for her group’s families. Som knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources. The water filter Som purchased will increase her family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decreasing the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available. Som is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years, so she and her group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a solar system to be able to light his house and give the opportunity to his family to have more productive hours.

loans.name: Barkwende De Djontoli Group

texts.fr:
Brigitte est une femme âgée de 31 ans elle est mariée. elle mène son activité de commerce depuis 4 ans, elle se déplace pour placé son  savon à crédit à ses clients et ses clients la rembourse dans un délai très bref. son atout pour réussir son commerce s'est qu'elle se déplace pour récupérer son argent au moment venu. elle a déjà reçu 3 fois le crédit et elle rembourse aux dates prévues. 
Elle veut le crédit de 125000f pour acheter du savons.
texts.en: Brigitte is a 31-year-old married woman. She has been running her business for four years, traveling to sell her soap on credit to her clients, who repay her after a very short time. Her advantage for the success of her business is that she travels to collect her money when the time comes. Brigitte has already received three loans and [has] repa[id them] on schedule. She wants the loan for 125,000 CFA francs in order to purchase soap.

loans.use: To purchase 125,000 [CFA francs' worth of] soap to sell.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.en: Mariana is 23 years old she is single she doesnt have children but she helps her parents she lives with them Mariana is still selling milk and being a seamstress This time Mariana needs a loan to pay the repairment of her parents' house this is a good chance for her too because in the future she will be the owner of the place so she hopes you can help her again In the picture you can see the place where Mariana is living with her family

loans.use: to pay for the repairment of her parents' house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production and supply for more income gain.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is aged 51 years, married to Mellen and he supports four children.

He has been a dairy farmer for the last 10 years and the business earns him KES 12,000 per month.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase a dairy cow for milk production.

He plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy goat for milk production and purchase chicks for rearing as he repays the loan.

His hope is to expand his business and agricultural sectors.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is aged 59 years, married to Martha and he supports eight children.

He has been selling electrical products for the last 20 years and the business earns him KES 15,000 per month.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase more electrical products such as torches, radios and extensions to sell to clients and meet both client and family needs.

He plans to use the gained profit to purchase a dairy goat for milk production and repay the loan.

His hope is to expand his business sector.

loans.use: to purchase more electrical products such as torches, radios and extensions to sell to clients and meet both client and family needs.

loans.name: Josephat

texts.en:
Josephat is aged 43 years, married to Florence and he supports two children.

He has been a dairy farmer for the last three years and the business earns him KES 15,000 per month.

He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase a dairy cow for milk production so as to supply clients daily with a lot of milk and meet their demands in milk supply.

He plans to use the gained profit to repay the loan and educate his children.

His hope is to expand his business sector and eradicate poverty.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow for milk production so as to supply clients daily with a lot of milk and meet their demands in milk supply.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell rice barn business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy rice barn to sell in her buy and sell rice barn business.

Lorna has been in this business for 11 years. Lorna earns more income from buying and selling rice .

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Lorna has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy rice to sell for her business.

loans.name: Edith Del Socorro

texts.es: Edith de 64 años, desde muy joven aprendió a confeccionar, sin embargo ella no le ofrecía este servicio al público, simplemente elaboraba prendas para su familia y uso personal, sin embargo su talento en la confección se hizo notar en las prendas que lucía ella y sus familiares; al observar que sus conocidos gustaban de las vestiduras que usaba, decidió aperturar su taller en su casa y desde entonces su vivienda es muy concurrida por vecinos y referidos del sector.  Edith tuvo una excelente experiencia en su taller y decidió incursionar también en el negocio de alquiler de lavadoras, actividad que le genera una buena rentabilidad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual invertirá en telas, hilos y accesorios.  Esta inversión le permitirá tener a la mano todas las materias primas y entregar los encargos más rápidamente.   Su meta es remodelar su vivienda y duplicar las ventas para el próximo año.
texts.en:
Since she was very young, 64-year-old Edith learned to make clothing. However, she didn't provide this service to public; she simply made clothing for her family and her personal use.

However, her talent for sewing was easy to see in the clothes that she and her family wore. Seeing that her acquaintances liked the clothes that she had, she decided to open a shop in her house. Since then, her house has been well-visited by neighbors and referrals from the area.

Edith had an excellent experience with her shop and decided to start up a business renting washing machines as well. This job is very profitable for her.

Now she is applying for a loan, the first that she has made through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will invest it in fabric, thread, and accessories.

This loan will allow her to have all the basic supplies on hand and complete customer requests more quickly. Her goal is to renovate her house and double her sales by the next year.

loans.use: to invest in fabric, thread, and accessories

loans.name: Phonngam Group

texts.en: Bounpone is excited the filter was available on an affordable payment plan. Bounpone and his group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood, even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years. The water filter Bounpone and his group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to five years. Bounpone and his group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. And after totaling up the costs, Bounpone and his group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a solar system to replace the use of candles and to have access to electricity.

loans.name: Lorgio Carmelo

texts.es:
A sus 42 años el señor Carmelo, luego de quedarse sin empleo, busca un auxilio económico con el fin de montar su propio negocio, un taller de calzado, el cual le genere los ingresos suficientes para cubrir las necesidades básicas que se hogar amerita.

Con este préstamo solicitado Carmelo comprara una maquina familiar para calzado, cuero, materiales sintéticos y tela. 
Una vez formalizado su negocio este hombre desea generar empleo a las personas más necesitadas.
Cumplirá el sueño de pagarles la educación a sus hijos y mejorara las condiciones de su casa.

En sus manos esta que este hombre crezca como familia y empresario, Anímese y haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
After finding himself without work at 42 years of age, Carmelo is looking for economic assistance, with the goal of starting his own business -- a shoe shop. This will provide him sufficient income to cover the basic necessities that his household deserves.

With this requested loan, Carmelo will buy a sewing machine for shoes, leather, synthetic materials, and cloth.

Once his business is formalized, this man wants to create jobs for the people most in need.

He will fulfill his dream of paying for his children's education, and he will improve the condition of his house.

It is in your hands whether this man grows as a family member and businessman. Go for it and make a loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for shoes, leather, synthetic materials, and cloth

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 62 years old. She is a widow with three adult children. Rosalia is a resident of Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She owns land, a vegetable farm, and a sari-sari (convenience) store. Rosalia has been a member of Paglaum MPC since 2006 and has availed herself of various programs and services that the cooperative offers.

Rosalia is requesting a loan to purchase bags of fertilizer for her vegetable farm business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 67 years old, married, and has six adult children. She lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. Lourdes owns a retail business where she sells various consumable items. 

Lourdes is requesting a loan to purchase bags of cement to repair her house. She hopes to live comfortably in her house.

loans.use: to purchase cement to repair her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, gravel, tin sheeting, poles, etc to build a toilet and washroom.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 60 years old, married, has 3 children of adult age and lives at Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a small sari-sari store (convenience store) in their place. Her business existed for more than 30 years and was supported by Paglaum MPCs programs and services. 

Recently, she took another loan of PHP 3,000.00 to purchase bags of cement for house repair. She is very thankful to the cooperative because she was supported by the cooperative on her financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement for house repair

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 48 years old, married and has 1 child of school age. She lives at Calamba, Misamis Occidental. Myrna owns and operates an ambulant snack vending business. She ventured into this kind of business so that she can help her husband in providing the needs of her family. 

Myrna learns about Paglaum MPC and the services it offers to its members. She sign up for membership last 2011 and has taken her first loan which she invested in her snack vending business. Now that she has high demands on the local market, she wish to supply it. Thus, she took another loan from PHP 25,000.00 to purchase a refrigerator for her business, where she can store her inventories for sale.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for her ambulant snack vending business

loans.name: Ana Alicia

texts.es:
Ana, de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está acompañada, su pareja es agricultor y juntos tienen dos hijos, ambos asisten a la escuela.

Ana, se dedica a los oficios domésticos del hogar y al cuido de sus hijos, en ocasiones también ayuda a su compañero de vida en trabajos agrícolas.

Ella, necesita el préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, pesticidas y herbicidas, ya que su pareja se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles. 

Ella sueña con ver crecer a sus hijos y que siempre sigan estudiando para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Ana, 33, studied until 6th grade. She is married to a farmer and they have two school-aged children. Ana works in the home and takes care of the children. On occasion she also helps her husband with the field work.

She needs a loan to buy agricultural inputs like compost, pesticides, and herbicides for her husband to use on the corn and bean crop. She dreams of seeing her children grow up and continue their studies so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like compost, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad is 65 years old, married, has 7 children of adult age, and lives at Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. She has mastered the retailing business of consumable goods. She ventures into this type of business because it is easy to sell this items. She has been into retailing business for 21 years that gives her meager income of PHP 5,600.00 every month. 

Recently, she took a loan to restock store with consumable goods, confectioneries, condiments and others. She believes that having more inventories for sale means more profit.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable goods, confectioneries, condiments and others

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo tiene 64 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos a su cargo , vive en casa familiar; vive en el distrito de Oyotún,la cual es una zona rural, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Ricardo se dedica a brindar servicio de jornaleria; hace 5 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de una mochila para fumigar; esto le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus herramientas y poder brindar mejores servicios, lo que le generará mayores ingresos, y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 64 years old. He is single, and he does not have any children under his care. He lives in a family home in the Oyotún district, a rural area that belongs to the Chiclayo province, which is located in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. 

For the past 5 years, Ricardo has made a living providing day laborer services. His business is located in his home. He is requesting a loan to invest in a fixed asset. He will buy a fumigation backpack, which will allow him to maintain his tools in better conditions and to offer better services. This will increase his income, which will permit him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a fumigation backpack.

loans.name: Monico Agustin

texts.es:
Mónico, con 37 años de edad, trabaja su finca de 3mz de café junto a su esposa; quien es un amplio soporte en la buena administración de los recursos que el negocio provee. Tiene más de 15 años de estar trabajando su pequeña finca, la cual ha ido mejorando gracias a la implementación de Buenas Prácticas Agrícolas que el equipo de la asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC) le ha capacitado.

La meta de este pequeño productor es incrementar el rendimiento productivo del área de café con que cuenta actualmente, lo cual se propone realizar con la implementación de un plan de manejo integral en su finca.

Para este ciclo de café, Mónico está solicitando un financiamiento para garantizar el suministro de insumos y fertilizantes que requieren sus plantaciones, lo cual realizará con el acompañamiento técnico de PAC. Confía en que su dedicación al trabajo y la disponibilidad de estos recursos le permitirán pasar en este ciclo a un aumento del 20% en la producción de café pergamino, lo cual le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
texts.en:
Mónico, 37 years old, works on his 5 acre coffee farm with his wife, who is a huge support in the good administration of the resources that the business provides. He has been working for more than 15 years on his small farm, which has been improving thanks to the implementation of good agricultural practices that the team from the Association for People in Community Action (PAC) has taught him.

The goal of this small producer is to increase the yield of the area of coffee that he currently has, which he intends to accomplish with the implementation of a comprehensive management plan on his farm. 

For this season of coffee, Mónico is seeking financing to guarantee the provision of supplies and fertilizers that his fields require, which he will accomplish with the technical support of PAC. Trust that his dedication to work and the availability of these resources will allow him to proceed this season to a 20% increase in the production of parchment coffee. This will allow him to improve the conditions of his family.

loans.use: to guarantee the provision of supplies and fertilizers that his fields require.

loans.name: Maria Lucila

texts.es:
Maria Lucila tiene 33 años, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge y su menor hijo en el distrito de Cayaltí, en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. Los pobladores de esta zona se dedican al comercio, agricultura y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida preparada desde aproximadamente 04 años, cuenta con clientes fijos en la zona quienes brindan muy buenas referencias comerciales y laborales de ella. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de ollas, utensilios de cocina, mesas y sillas para implementar su negocio, con esto Maria Lucila espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes brindandoles mayor comodidad, esto le permitirá incrementar su volumen de ventas y aumentar sus ingresos lo que le generará una mayor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Lucila, 33, lives in her own home with her husband and their son in the district of Cayalti, province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The inhabitants of this region work primarily in commerce, agriculture and cattle.

Maria Lucila has been selling prepared food for about 4 years. She has an established clientele in her area who provide many good professional references for her. She will use the loan to buy pots, cooking utensils, tables and chairs for her business. These will allow Maria Lucila to provide better service to her customers, offering them more comfort, and will increase her sales volume and her profits. This will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pots, cooking utensils, tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Khonetao Group

texts.en: Vanh’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  Vanh and his group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now he can shift to other pursuits.  Vanh and his village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years; within this 2 years filter users, like Vanh’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Ana Argelis

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer con 22 años de edad, que desde hace poco logro consolidar su propio negocio, una salsamentaría, la cual le genera los ingresos suficiente para el sostenimiento de su familia conformada por una hija de 3 años de edad y su actual pareja.

Solicita un crédito el cual lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para mejorar las condiciones de su negocio, ya que este no se encuentra en buen estado y no es el indicado para la venta de productos para el consumo diario.

Sus sueños son muchos, pero el principal es pagarle la educación a su hijo, pues es el motor que la impulsa día a día para seguir luchando.

Haga parte de este sueño, haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Ana is a 22 year old woman who recently managed to consolidate her own business, a deli. It generates sufficient income to support her family consisting of a 3 year old daughter and her current partner.

She is asking for a loan which she will invest in the purchase of supplies to improve the conditions of her business as it is not in good condition and not suitable for the sale of products for daily consumption.

Her dreams are many but the main one is to pay for her child’s education which is the engine that drives her to continue fighting day after day.

Be part of this dream by making a loan!

loans.use: to buy supplies to improve the conditions of her business

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 70 years old, married, has seven children of adult age and lives in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is a retired school teacher and also operates a rice farm. 

She has been into farming for 40 years. Through her farming activities, she gains additional income and has sent all her children to school. She is a good member of the cooperative and has attended various activities and seminars given by PMPC. Currently, she avails herself of a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase bags of cement and paint and to pay for labor costs for house renovations. 

She is thankful to the cooperative because PMPC responded to her financial needs.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and paint and to pay for labor costs for house renovations

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza is 52 years old, married, has one child of adult age and lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She owns a farm, which she has cultivated for more than 10 years. 

Recently, she has availed herself of a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase 10 bags of fertilizers for her farming business. She hopes to have good harvest this cropping season.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of fertilizers for her farming business

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es:
El  señor Fausto tiene 61 años de edad, vive en un Barrio de Trojes, El Paraíso, al Oriente de Honduras,  Su actividad principal es el comercio, cuenta con una pequeña pulperia.
Don Fausto  se levanta  muy temprano para ofrece sus productos de la canasta básica familiar a personas del Municipio y personas que le visiten de las aldeas cercanas, tiene varios años de dedicarse a esta  actividad, esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de arroz, azúcar, huevos, harina, papel higiénico, etc. Con el crédito que espera le permitirá mantener más surtido su negocio.
Don Fausto  espera que esta inversión le permita mejorar sus ingresos en el hogar y también satisfacer la demanda de su clientela, uno de  sus sueños es mejorar las condiciones de vida y su familia, con el apoyo que reciba del préstamo le contribuirá a lograr sus sueños.

Trojes, Honduras – Junio del  2015
texts.en:
Fausto is 61 years old. He lives in a neighborhood of Trojes, El Paraíso, in the east of Honduras, His main activity is commerce. He has a small store.

Fausto gets up very early to offer his basic food items to people of the municipality and people who visit from nearby villages. He has been running his business for years. He is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, eggs, flour, toilet paper, etc. With the loan he hopes to keep his store well stocked.

Fausto hopes that this loan will allow him to increase the revenue for his household and satisfy the demand from clients. One of his dreams is to improve his living conditions and that of his family. The help that he receives from the loan will contribute to his achieving his dreams.

Trojes, Honduras – June 2015.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, eggs, flour, toilet paper, etc. for his business.

loans.name: Fredy Alonso

texts.es:
Fredy es un hombre de 40 años de edad, dedicado a la preparación y venta de comida, un medio por el cual ha logrado salir adelante junto con su familia conformada por tres hijas menores y su pareja.
Su tiempo de trabajo es constantemente, pues las ganas de trabajar son muchas.

Fredy solicita un préstamo con el cual abastecerá su negocio de frutas, comprar una carpa grande y hará unos arreglos que su carro de comidas amerita.

El sueño de este hombre es poder formalizar su negocio, para lograr generar más ingresos y remodelar su vivienda, ya que el estado de esta no es el mejor.

Con su aporte este hombre podrá alcanzar sus sueños, preste hoy.
texts.en:
Fredy is a 40 year old man. He prepares and sells food which has allowed him and his family to get ahead. His family consists of three young daughters and his partner.

He works constantly because he has a strong desire to work. Fredy is asking for a loan which he will use to supply his fruit business, buy a large awning, and make some repairs to his deserving food cart.

This man dreams of being able to formalize his business in order to generate more income and remodel his home as it is not in the best state.

With your support this man will be able to achieve his dreams. Loan today!

loans.use: to buy a big awning and to make some repairs to his deserving food cart

loans.name: Jose Dolores

texts.es:
José Dolores es un pequeño productor de café de la zona Norte de Nicaragua. Vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en su finca de 12 manzanas, de las cuales 3 son de café. En el último año, su producción de café fue de 120 quintales pergamino. Su visión es incrementar los rendimientos productivos de su plantación de café, mediante la ejecución de un plan de mantenimiento tecnificado el cual piensa implementar de la mano con el equipo técnico de la asociación Pueblos en Acción Comunitaria (PAC). 

Para este ciclo su meta es enfrentar los problemas de plagas y enfermedades que afectan el café mediante la aplicación de insumos y fertilizantes que requiere su plantación, para lo cual está solicitando un financiamiento. Él está seguro que con la disposición de recursos, su trabajo y el acompañamiento técnico, podrá alcanzar sus metas, y esto le permitirá tener mayores ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Dolores is a small producer of coffee in the northern region of Nicaragua. He lives with his wife and their children on his 20-acre farm, 5 acres of which is dedicated to coffee. Last year he produced 12000 kilograms of raw coffee.

His vision is to increase the production output of his coffee plantation by executing a maintenance plan using the technical advice from the Towns in Community Action association (Pueblos en Accion Comunitaria). During this cycle, his goal is to confront the problems of pests and diseases that affect his coffee. He will do this by applying agricultural inputs and fertilizers to his plantation. He feels certain that with these resources, his hard work, and the technical assistance, he will be able to meet his goals. This will allow him to have more income for the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to apply agricultural inputs and fertilizers to his plantation to deal with plagues and diseases that affect his coffee crop.

loans.name: Alcisa Corina

texts.es:
Alcisa es una mujer con 59 años de edad,  trabajadora y humilde, que desde hace poco logro consolidar su propio negocio, una pequeña tienda la cual ubico en la sala de la casa donde reside.
Con esto ha tenido un gran progreso, ha logrado salir adelante con su hijo, ante la ausencia de su padre quien los abandono hace poco.

Alcisa se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual lo invertirá en la compra de b.ebidas, snack y variabilidad de producto de la canasta familiar
Para esta mujer no hay nada imposible, quiere seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de comprarse una vivienda propia.

En sus manos esta que esta mujer cumpla su sueño y crezca como empresaria y/o familia, anímese y haga un préstamo.
texts.en:
Alcisa, 59, is a hard-working and humble woman who recently was able to put together her own business, a small store located in the living room of the house where she resides.
With this, she has made great progress.  He has been able to forge ahead with her son in the face of the absence of his father who abandoned them recently.
Alcisa finds herself requesting a loan which she will invest in the purchase of drinks, snacks, and a variety of household products.
For this woman, nothing is impossible.  She wants to continue working in order to fulfill the dream of buying her own home.
It is in your hands whether this woman is able to fulfill her dream and grow as an entrepreneur with her family.  Rouse yourself and make a loan.

loans.use: to buy drinks, snacks and a variety of household items.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La señora Rosa, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada con el señor Macario tienen dos hijos dependientes de sus ingresos, viven en una comunidad rural y sus hijos estudian en las unidades educativas del municipio. La señora Rosa, se dedica a la agricultura porque es lo único que aprendió con sus progenitores. El año 2014 sufrió una disminución en sus ingresos económicos por los bajos precios de los productos agrícolas y también por las lluvias que le echaron a perder sus plantaciones. La señora Rosa, requiere un préstamo para la compra de semilla de papa que requiere para la producción y para la alimentación de sus hijos, de esta manera podrá mejorar su economía y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Señora Rosa is 53 years old. She is married to Señor Macario, and they have two children dependent on their income. They live in a rural community and their children study in the municipal educational institutions.

Señora Rosa earns her living in agriculture because that is all she learned from her parents. In the year 2014, she suffered a reduction in her income because of the low prices for agricultural products and also because of the rains that caused her to lose her crops. 

Señora Rosa needs a loan to purchase potato seeds that she needs for her production as well as to feed her children. In this way, she will be able to improve her finances and her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds that she needs for her production as well as to feed her children. In this way, she will be able to improve her finances and her quality of life.

loans.name: Thasee Group

texts.en:
Maithong is excited the filter was available on an affordable payment plan.  

Maithong and her group, along with other villagers, participated in a village meeting where they discussed the costs of treating local water supplies.  Charcoal, firewood and even bottled water were discussed and priced out over two years. The water filter Maithong and her group purchased is guaranteed for two years but is known to function for up to 5 years. Maithong and her group also discussed the cost of medical care for water-borne disease. 

After totaling up the costs, Maithong and her group recognized the substantial financial savings the water filter will have for them and their families.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Felix tiene 41 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en una comunidad de Trojes,  El Paraíso, al Oriente de Honduras,  tiene 10 años de dicarse a la caficultura y cuenta con buena experiencia.
Don Felix es una persona responsable y trabajadora por ahora tiene como proyecto emprender un nuevo negocio de venta de medicinas quiere comprar analgesicos, antiarlergicos, pastillas varias, etc. ya que en su comunidad no se cuenta con un lugar donde las personas puedan realizar este tipo de compras. 
Con esta inversion espera poder realizar este proyecto ya que su sueño es poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de el y su familia.

 Trojes, Honduras, Junio del 2015
texts.en:
Felix is 41 years old. He lives with his wife and his three children in the community called Trojes, El Paraiso, located in the eastern part of Honduras. Felix  has made a living growing coffee for ten years and has a lot of experience. He is responsible and hardworking. 

Currently, Felix is opening a new business selling medicines. For this, he wants to buy painkillers, allergy medications, various pills, and more. In his community, there is no place where people can buy these items. With this loan, Felix will open this business. His dream is to improve his family's quality of life. 

 Trojes, Honduras, June 2015

loans.use: para la compra de analgesicos, antiarlergicos, pastillas varias, etc. para su negocio

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca, de 60 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, no tuvo las posibilidades de seguir estudiando y sus padres siempre le inculcaron el trabajo del campo, ella fue madre soltera, solo tuvo una hija que ahora ya está casada y vive aparte.- Francisca, solo vive con dos nietas y una sobrina.

Francisca, se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que era muy joven, su padre siempre la llevaba a trabajar al campo ya que era la única fuente de ingresos que ellos como familia tenían; pero luego ella se embarazó y se le dificultaba trabajar en la agricultura, pero a pesar de eso y con mucho esfuerzo y vendiendo frutas de cosecha saco adelante su hija.- Francisca, actualmente le está cuidando sus dos hijas, pero nunca ha dejado de cultivar maíz.

Francisca, necesita el crédito para comprar abono y fertilizantes para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, este crédito le ayudara mucho porque cuando venga la lluvia podre abonarla y así dará una mejor cosecha.

Los principales deseos de Francisca son, poder seguir cultivando la tierra y que sus nietas puedan seguir estudiando y sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Francisca, is 60 years old and studied up to the eighth grade. She was unable to continue studying and her parents always taught her how to work in the fields. She was a single mother and she had just one daughter who is now married and lives apart from her. Francisca just lives with two granddaughters and a niece.

Francisca has made her living farming since she was very young. Her father always took her to work in the fields as it was the only source of income that they had as a family. However, later, when she was pregnant it was difficult for her to work farming. Despite this, and with a lot of effort in selling the fruits of her harvest, she was able to get her daughter ahead. Francisca currently cares for her two daughters but she has never stopped growing corn.

Francisca needs the loan to buy manure and fertilizers to plant 7,000 square meters of corn. This loan will help her a lot because when the rain comes, she can fertilize and will therefore get a better harvest.

Francisca's main dreams are to be able to continue planting the land and that her granddaughters will be able to continue studying and become professionals.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Roberta

texts.es: La señora Roberta se dedica a la agricultura hace 12 años, es una actividad que aprendió de sus padres. En sus pequeñas parcelas de terreno que su padre le regalo cultiva Papa, Maíz y Maní. Tiene una hija dependiente de sus ingresos y de manera responsable se esfuerza por brindarle una mejor vida a su pequeña hija; para tener un buen ingreso la señora trabaja también como jornalera. Ella proviene de una familia humilde de escasos recursos económicos. En la pasada gestión la señora tuvo problemas externos en sus cultivos ya que fue afectada por una sequía y por ello perdió gran parte de sus cultivos. Ahora necesita recursos económicos para poder comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas, para continuar con su actividad y brindarle un mejor futuro a su pequeña familia.
texts.en:
Roberta has been making a living for twelve years in agriculture, an activity she learned from her parents.  In her small parcels of land which her father gave her, she cultivates potatoes, corn, and peanuts.
She has a daughter dependent on her income and in a responsible manner she struggles to offer a better life to her little daughter.  In order to bring in a good income, she also works as a day-laborer.  She comes from a humble family with scarce economic resources.
In the past season, she had external problems with her crops since the area was affected by a drought and because of this she lost a good part of her crops.  Now she needs the economic resources in order to be able to buy seeds and agricultural supplies in order to continue her work and offer a better future to her small family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies to continue with her work and offer a better future for her small family.

loans.name: Jose Lino

texts.es: José de 36 años de edad, habita  junto a su compañera de vida, una hija de 3 años de edad  y su suegra. Él es un hombre muy trabajador que presta sus servicios cuidando una granja en la que tienen crianza de pollos, además es ayudante de albañil en sus días libres, es así como José logra brindar los insumos necesarios para su familia, además de recibir el apoyo de su compañera de vida con algunos gastos  del hogar. El desea construir una habitación dormitorio para poder brindar una mejor comodidad a su familia es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: arena, cemento, grava, ladrillo, etc., para construir las paredes de un cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en: José is a 36 years old. He lives with his life's companion, a 3 year old daughter, and his mother in law. He is a very hardworking man who works caring for a farm where chickens are raised. He is also an assistant bricklayer on his days off. This is how José is able to provide what his family needs. He also gets help from his life's companion with some of the household expenses. He wants to build a bedroom to offer his family more comfort. That is why he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in sand, cement, gravel, bricks, etc. to build the walls of a bedroom.

loans.use: to invest in sand, cement, gravel, bricks, etc., to build the walls of a bedroom.

loans.name: Denise

texts.en:
Denise is from a long line of businesswomen, but always has worked for somebody else, which left her feeling constricted.

After being laid off from the corporate world in April, she knew she wanted to do something different.

She has always braided hair on the side, so she decided to formalize her business after she went through the Accion Academy Entrepreneurial Training Class, which prepared her to officially launch her business this year.

Denise is excited to have this opportunity to be her own boss and have more flexibility to be with her 11-year-old son.

The Kiva loan will be used to build out her hair studio in her home, purchase equipment, and pay for marketing.

loans.use: to build out her hair studio in her home, purchase additional equipment, and pay for marketing.

loans.name: Oscar Mauricio

texts.es: Oscar de 47 años de edad que habita en casa de su propiedad vvive junto a su esposa con quien lleva treinta y tres años de casado. Él es un hombre trabajador que posee un negocio de venta de ropa y carteras con el que genera sus ingresos para brindar todo lo necesario a su familia. Oscar cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que lo conocen y lo recomiendan por ser muy amable, además de que recibe el apoyo de su esposa con algunos gastos del hogar. El desea construir un cuarto en la parte alta de su casa con motivo de ampliar su vivienda para brindar una mayor comodidad a su esposa  y su familia y por esa razon solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: grava, cemento, arena, ladrillo, etc., para la construcción de cuarto en la segunda planta de su vivienda.
texts.en: Oscar is 47 years old. He lives in a house he owns with his wife, to whom he has been married for thirty three years. He is a hardworking man who has a clothes and purse selling business, with which he generates income to offer his family everything that they need. Oscar has a large number of customers who know him and recommend him because he is so friendly. He also gets help from his wife with some of the household expenses. He wants to build a room in the upper part of his house in order to add on to his house so it will be more comfortable for his wife and their family. That is why he is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in gravel, cement, sand, bricks, etc., to build a room on the second floor of his house.

loans.use: to invest in gravel, cement, sand, bricks, etc. to build a room on the second floor of his house.

loans.name: Leonides Sr.

texts.en: Leonides Sr. is 44 years old and married. He lives in Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. For the past 7 years, Leonides Sr. has been a farmer. He earns 10,500 PHP each month and is a new member of PMPC. Leonides Sr. is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan to purchase fertilizer. In the future, he hopes to expand and improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is 39 years old, married and lives at Doña Josefa, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She has been in the fish vending business for 15 years together with her husband who is a fisherman. Through her business, she has contributed to the income of her family and has been able to provide for the needs of her children. Judith has nurtured her membership with Paglaum MPC because of the opportunity given to small time borrowers like her. Recently, she received another loan to purchase a freezer for her business.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer for her fish vending business

loans.name: Alma Fe

texts.en:
Alma Fe is 32 years old, married, has 2 children of school age and lives at Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. Alma Fe has been into farming since she've got married. Her farming business was supported by Paglaum MPC since 2012. 

Recently, she avails loan of PHP 11,000.00 to pay for seed bed preparation and purchase bags of fertilizers.

loans.use: to pay for seed bed preparation and purchase bags of fertilizers

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 69 years old, married, has 7 adult children and lives at Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. 

She has owned and operated a sari-sari store (convenience store) for 20 years. Recently, she avails loan of PHP 10,000.00 to restock sari-sari store with consumable items like canned goods, oil, soy sauce and other consumable items

loans.use: to restock sari-sari store with consumable items like canned goods, oil, soy sauce and other items

loans.name: Veronica Lisseth

texts.es:
Verónica, de 43 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, porque no tuvo más ayuda de sus padres para seguir estudiando, es viuda y solo vive con su hijo de 19 años el cual trabaja para colaborar con los gastos en el hogar. 

Verónica, trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace 8 años, pero además cultiva junto a su hijo y en sus días libres prepara antojitos como yuca frita, pastelitos de carne y enchiladas para vender.

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar abono, semilla, pesticidas y fertilizante para sembrar maíz.

En el futuro Verónica, sueña con tener una granja de pollos, pero antes desea terminar de mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Verónica, is years old. She went to school up to the second grade because she didn't have more help from her parents to stay in school. She is a widow and lives with just her son, who is 19. He works to help with the household expenses.  

Verónica has worked as a domestic employee for 8 years, but she also farms with her son and on her days off prepares traditional food such as fried yucca, meat pastries and enchiladas to sell. 

She will use the loan to buy compost, seeds, pesticides and fertilizer to plant corn. 

In the future, Verónica dreams of having a chicken farm, but before that she wants to finish improving her home.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, pesticide, and fertilizer to plant corn.

loans.name: Nety

texts.en:
Nety is 64 years old, married, has four children of adult age and is a resident of Baliangao-Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She owns a sari-sari store (convenience store) which she has operated for 10 years now. This business gives her meager income that provides for the needs of her family. 

Nety is a member in good standing of Paglaum MPC without records of default. Just this month, Nety has availed herself of another loan to restock her store with canned goods, soy sauce, oil, vinegar and other consumable items.

loans.use: to restock her store with canned goods, soy sauce, oil, vinegar and other consumable items

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en: Trinidad has been in the retailing business for more than 20 years. This kind of business has give her a meager income of PHP 4,500.00 per month that she's used to help cover her household expenses. Like the way Trinidad nurtures her business, she also nurtures her membership with her cooperative through repaying her loans on time. Recently, she availed another loan of PHP 14,900.00 to restock her store with consumable items like canned goods, confectioneries, condiments and soaps. She has high hopes that someday, she can expand her business.

loans.use: to restock her store with consumable items like canned goods, confectioneries, condiments and soaps

loans.name: Magdalina

texts.en:
Magdalina is married, has three children of school age and lives at Baliangao-Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a corn field and a sari-sari store (convenience store). These business activities were supported by Paglaum MPC through its financial services. 

Recently, she took a loan of PHP 10,000 to restock her store with consumable items like canned goods, oil, soy sauce, vinegar and others.

loans.use: to restock store with consumable items like canned goods, oil, soy sauce, vinegar and others

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is married, has two children and lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She and her husband are farmers. They operate and till their corn field. 

Ofelia is a Member In Good Standing (MIGS) of Paglaum MPC. She nurtures her membership with the cooperative because all of her financial needs were addressed by PMPC. 

Recently, she applied for a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase bags of fertilizers for her corn production business. She believes that enough fertilizers for her corn would mean more yield.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers for corn production

loans.name: Carla Gueyssy

texts.es: La Sra. Carla, está casada tiene 2 hijos pequeños, actualmente vive en un cuarto que heredo de sus padres junto con su esposo. La señora Carla trabajo desde muy joven ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos y durante varios años se fue a la ciudad de Santa Cruz donde trabajo de todo. Cuando era pequeña su padre trabajaba en un taller de carpintería en el cual la señora Carla aprendió este oficio y trabajo barnizando todo tipo de muebles, es ahí que en un taller conoció a su esposo con el cual actualmente abrieron un pequeño taller de barnizados de muebles, puertas y marcos de ventanas, negocio que lo manejan ambos. La señora Carla necesita un préstamo para la compra de sopleteadores industriales e insumos de trabajo para su taller, la señora Carla se siente esperanzada porque tendrá un mayor ingreso económico ya que podrá tener más trabajos y de esta forma mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Carla is married and has 2 small children. Now she lives with in a house she inherited from her parents with her husband. Carla has worked from when she was very young, since her parents were of low income and for several years she went to the city of Santa Cruz where she worked at everything. When she was little, her father worked in a carpentry shop where Carla learned the trade and finishing work on all kinds of furniture. It was in the shop that she met her husband. They have now opened a small shop for finishing furniture, doors, and window frames. They both run the business. Carla needs a loan to buy industrial sprayers and work materials for her shop. Carla is hopeful because she will have more income since she will have more work and thus she will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy industrial sprayers and work materials for her shop.

loans.name: Basalinda

texts.en: Basalinda is 64 years old, married, has 4 children and lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She has owned and operated a timber mill for the past 5 years. Through this business, she provides for her family's needs. Through Paglaum MPC programs and services, she expanded her business and sold varieties of wood for construction businesses. Recently, she availed another loan of PHP 14,900.00 to purchase additional coco lumber to sell.

loans.use: to purchase additional coco lumber to sell

loans.name: Emma

texts.en: Emma is 53 years old, married and a resident of San Vicente Alto, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a sari-sari store (convenience store) which has been financed by Paglaum MPC for more than 10 years. Emma has enjoyed the benefits and services extended by the cooperative, that is why she is eager to maintain her membership in good standing without records of default. Currently, Emma availed another loan of PHP 8,000.00 to redeem land that she previously pawned.

loans.use: to redeem pawned land

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with five children.

She runs a buying and selling charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pig fattening and buying and selling bananas.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Edna dreams that one day, she will be able to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Jenelie

texts.en:
Jenelie is a hardworking entrepreneur with seven children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc. 

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like fish vending.

Jenelie dreams that one day she will be able to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

loans.name: Alexa

texts.en:
Alexa is 67 years old. She is a widow and lives in Calamba, Misamis Occidental. She operates a fruit stand that primarily sells bananas. She has been into this type of business since her husband died. This business gives her an income that supports her family needs. 

She signed up for membership with the cooperative and enjoys the benefits and services it offers to its members. She successfully repaid her loans with no records of default. 

Currently, she is availing herself of a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase 100 kilos bananas for sale. She has high hopes that she can continuously supply bananas to her patronizers through the financial assistance extended to small-scale lenders like her.

loans.use: to purchase 100 kilos of bananas for sale

loans.name: Maria Efigenia

texts.es:
María, de 54 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos varones, de los cuales dos ya tienen sus propias familias y el hijo menor estudia cuarto grado en la escuela de la comunidad; María creció junto con sus padres elaborando hamacas de hilo de mezcal (henequén) y sembrando granos básicos, actualmente de ella dependen económicamente su hijo menor y una nieta que está en su casa.

María, trabaja desde joven en la venta de productos de primera necesidad en la comunidad donde y desde hace varios años coloco una tiendita, pues no habían tiendas y tenían que ir a comprar hasta la ciudad que esta más cerca y caminar más de media hora para llegar a su casa; la tienda está abierta de Lunes a Domingos y los principales productos que vende son arroz, aceite, frijoles, pan, huevos, golosinas y gaseosas); pero también vende pupusas los fines de semana en las tardes y su nieta es quien le ayuda a cuidar la tienda mientras ella hace las pupusas.

El crédito que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO es para invertirlo en la tienda y comprar maíz, frijoles y otros productos necesarios para el hogar, de esa manera pretende impulsar su negocio y poder ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes. 

Ella sueña con poder seguir trabajando y aumentar las ventas  de  su pequeña tienda;  además sueño con mejorar poco a poco su vivienda, para vivir mucho más cómodos.
texts.en:
María is 54 years old. She is the single mother of three sons, two of whom already have their own families. Her youngest son is studying in fourth grade in the community school. María grew up making "henequén"  [agave-fiber] hammocks with her parents and growing staple grains. Currently, her youngest son and one granddaughter, who is in her house, depend on her financially.

María has worked since she was young selling staple products in her community and several years ago she set up a little shop, as there were no shops and they had to go shopping in the nearest city, more than a half-hour walk from home. Her shop is open from Monday to Sunday. The main products that she sells are rice, oil, beans, bread, eggs, snacks, and sodas, but she also sells "pupusas" [thick, stuffed, handmade corn tortillas] on weekend afternoons. Her granddaughter helps her take care of the shop while she makes the pupusas.

The loan she is requesting from CREDICAMPO is to invest in the shop and to buy corn, beans, and other necessary household goods. In this way, she intends to stimulate her business and to be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

She dreams of being able to keep working and to increase sales in her little shop. In addition, she dreams of improving her house little by little so that they can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to invest in her store and to buy corn, beans, and other necessary household products.

loans.name: José Angel

texts.es:
José Ángel, es un pequeño productor que tiene una pequeña finca en el norte de Nicaragua, con una extensión con cafetos de 2 mz. Junto a su esposa, han emprendido la caficultura desde hace 10 años, aumentando en los últimos tres ciclos hasta en un 25% su rendimiento de café; y esto lo ha logrado gracias al buen manejo que provee a sus cafetos, lo que le ha valido para la obtención de la certificación Comercio Justo. 

José es un ejemplo tanto para sus hijos como en su comunidad; posee cualidades que lo ayudan a ser líder en la comunidad. 

Para el nuevo ciclo 2015-2016, él está solicitando un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que le ayuden a mantener la cantidad y calidad de su café, a fin de contribuir al bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Angel is a small producer with a small farm in the north of Nicaragua, amounting to 3.5 acres. Together with his wife, he has practiced coffee cultivation for some 10 years. In the last three annual cycles, Jose has augmented production by 25%. This he has achieved thanks to the good management he provides for his plants, which has earned him 'Just Commerce' certification.

Jose is an example for his children and his community; he possesses qualities that have helped him become a leader in the community. 

For the new cycle of 2015-16, Jose is soliciting financing for the purchase of agricultural inputs that will help him maintain the quantity and quality of his coffee so that he can contribute to his family's well-being.

loans.use: purchase agricultural inputs that will help him maintain the quantity and quality of his coffee.

loans.name: Leah

texts.en: Leah is 35 years old, married and a resident of Talic, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She has mastered her hog raising since she and her husband got married. Leah has access to the services offered by Paglaum MPC and had several loans. Recently, she requested another loan in an amount of 5,000 PHP to purchase plywood, nails and sticks for house repair. She wants to live comfortably in a decent home.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails and sticks for house repair

loans.name: Marelyn

texts.en: Marelyn is 36 years old, married, with four children and she lives at Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She owns a fruit and vegetable vending business and also has a vegetable farm. She is a new member of Paglaum MPC and has enjoyed its program and services. Currently, she is requesting a loan of 14,000 PHP to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizers and pesticides

location.town: Pagadian - Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Donekong Group

texts.en:
Honkeo understands the difference that water filters can make for his family and for his other group member's family. Honkeo knows that local water sources require boiling before consumption, and boiling water consumes natural and financial resources.  The water filter Honkeo purchased will increase his family’s disposable income by substantially decreasing money spent to buy charcoal or decrease the time and cost foraging for firewood. The filter also eliminates the need to purchase bottled water if it is available.    

Honkeo is excited that the filter was purchased on an affordable payment schedule and the filter is guaranteed for two years so he and his group can continue to receive the many benefits of clean water for many months to come.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.
